review:
** ********* ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ********** Apart from being a great doctor, she is also a very compassionate, humble and a friendly person.  

I consulted her for my second pregnancy. 
I reached out to her through online reviews and never regretted it. She guided me throughout my pregnancy journey, explaining every aspect in detail‚Äîdiet, medicines, scans, and more. She made timely decisions whenever needed and was committed to ensuring a normal delivery. Her support during the delivery process was invaluable, and I‚Äôm certain a normal delivery wouldn‚Äôt have been possible without her help. She was always available on call whenever needed. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking a caring and knowledgeable healthcare provider.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am pleased to provide this feedback for an exceptional and highly experienced doctor who guided me through my pregnancy with utmost care and professionalism. From my very first visit, she considered my medical history and age, offering consistent support throughout my journey to motherhood. Her proactive approach in sharing information, addressing concerns, and managing stress was invaluable. I felt truly fortunate to be under her guidance during this important time. I highly recommend her to any expecting mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,prepregnancy advice,
review: We were recommended to Dr Rituparna by some of her ex patients and also lot of great reviews online. They gave high praises to her humane and compassionate way of taking ownership of her patients journey. She always went the extra mile to care, guide and counsel the patients. We were already trying to get pregnant for few years when we went to Dr Ritu for pre pregnancy counselling. And that's when we absolutely fell in love with her way of explaining technical complications in easy to understand step by step logical and scientific approach. We followed her advise to the last detail and were able to concieve soon naturally. Our pregnancy proceeded under her able guidance. She always emphasised to us the natural way of birthing. All medical interventions, if any, were suggested only when absolutely needed. At 39th week when my water broke, we got ourselves admitted as per her guidance and the next very day we were holding our healthy baby in our hands. Even the recovery for me, the mother is progressing swiftly. I have already started to walk, albeit slowly. To us she was like an elder sister, always approachable and ready with expert guidance. We are very grateful for having her as our guide, mentor and doctor in our pregnancy journey.  - Jayashree Kundu

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Navigating pregnancy and childbirth can be daunting, but under the care of Dr. Rituparna Bera Sarkar, it became a journey filled with confidence and reassurance.

Dr. Ritu‚Äôs approach blends expertise with genuine compassion. From our initial consultation to the final postpartum check-up, she maintained a reassuring demeanor that instantly put me at ease. Her thorough explanations and patient-centered approach ensured that I felt empowered and informed every step of the way.

Post-delivery, Dr. Ritu continued to impress with her unwavering dedication. She monitored my recovery and the baby's health meticulously, promptly addressing any concerns with attentiveness and care.

In summary, Dr. Rituparna Bera Sarkar is not just a doctor; she is a beacon of excellence in maternal care. Her professionalism, coupled with her compassionate approach, sets a benchmark in the field. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Ritu to anyone seeking exceptional prenatal and postnatal care.
Dr is friendly and listen all the issue carefully and suggest accordingly. She is ************* *** experienced in any women well being issue.

Throughout our journey, she offered unwavering encouragement and sage guidance. We're deeply grateful for her optimistic approach and empathetic treatment. We wholeheartedly recommend her to our friends, family, and colleagues.

review: Thank you Ritu for your unwavering support and guidance throughout my pregnancy. I got to know about Ritu from my cousin and was delivered by her. It was my first pregnancy with few complications, I used to feel nervous for every check-up since I have complications but Ritu always ensured that I was going with a big smile after consulting her. She will tell you all the complications associated with pregnancy in every month so that we will be cautious which I expected from my doctor. Ritu always encourage you to go with a normal delivery unless you have any other complications. I gave vaginal birth even though my water broke and no progress in labour for more than 5-6 hours after inducing with all her support. She has an option to go with caesarean but patiently waited for my labour pains to start. Always grateful to Ritu for everything üôè. * *** *** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********* *** ***** ****** ********* ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We met Dr.Rituparna for my wife's irregular periods and later Dr.Rituparna not only solved the issue but also helped my wife in conceiving. I thank the Dr. for her tireless service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I consulted Dr. Rituparna for my second pregnancy, and from that moment, my journey was a breeze. She is a brilliant and reliable OB/GYN who provided unwavering support and guidance throughout my pregnancy and delivery. I always felt informed and confident about every procedure, test, and scan. Dr. Rituparna ensured I understood the reasons behind each step and the role of every medication during the gestational period.

Her approach is practical and considerate. She never advised unnecessary scans or tests, which not only saved us money but also provided peace of mind. Compared to my first pregnancy, this experience was much more financially manageable and stress-free.

Dr. Rituparna's exceptional listening skills and approachable demeanour made it easy to discuss any concerns or doubts. She is an active and patient listener, always ready to provide thorough and compassionate answers. She is truly gifted in her craft, and I couldn't have found a better doctor for my pregnancy and delivery. I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone in need of outstanding prenatal and delivery care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Ritu was an absolute godsend throughout my entire pregnancy! From the very first appointment, she had this calming aura that just made me feel instantly relaxed and reassured. It was clear she really cared about her patients and understood all the anxieties that come with being pregnant.

She took all the time in the world to explain everything to us, from each stage of pregnancy to all the tests and scans we'd need. She never made us feel rushed and answered every question we had, no matter how silly it might have seemed.

What we especially loved about Dr. Ritu was how much she pushed for a natural delivery if possible. We were on board with that approach, and thanks to her guidance and support (and of course, following her instructions!), we were able to have a smooth pregnancy and deliver our beautiful son naturally.

We honestly feel incredibly lucky to have had Dr. Ritu with us on this journey. Her expertise is top-notch, of course, but it was her kindness, empathy, and the way she treated us as individuals that truly made the difference.  She absolutely helped us achieve the positive and fulfilling pregnancy experience we'd always hoped for. If you're looking for the best doctor in the city for a natural birth, look no further than Dr. Ritu!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My journey of pregnancy: From conception to delivery         Words are less to thank Dr Rituparna.
Dr. Rituparna is the best gynecologist I have met so far. She is such a wonderful doctor who takes utmost care of her patients. Her excellent expertise and efficiency and the precision with which she accomplishes her duty as a responsible and dedicated doctor is commendable. 
I approached Dr. Rituparna for the opinion on conceiving for the second child. Since I was 40+ and already had 2 miscarriages, I lost all hope of having a second child. She had done some initial investigation and confirmed that I can conceive naturally and suggested a few medications. As she said I conceived within 6 months after consulting her. I was a bit worried during my pregnancy due to the age factor, but she took all possible precautions to make  it a healthy pregnancy. After 38 weeks, I delivered a healthy baby. She proved that age does not matter for having a baby.                                                                                                                       I highly recommend her for any pregnancy/infertility issue and,  believe me you will be in a safe hand.                     "Thanks a lot Dr. Rituparna", I would be forever grateful to you for turning my dream into reality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly, I want to extend my deepest gratitude to Dr. Rituparna for everything. She is among the finest gynecologists in Bangalore. From the start of my pregnancy, Dr. Ritu has been with me, and I am thoroughly satisfied. Her dedication to each patient and her guidance through every step of the pregnancy is truly exceptional.

I felt a unique bond with her. She supported me through my delivery and continued to provide care even afterward. The most remarkable aspect for me is that, despite my usual anxiety, she made me feel incredibly calm and at ease.

If I detailed everything, this note would be quite lengthy. Therefore, I highly recommend Dr. Ritu to all expecting parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant,Pregnancy care and management,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
What can I say and where to start.

I started visiting Dr Rituperna from my 4th month of pregnancy onwards  after seeing good reviews in Google.

I was surprised and immediately decided after the first consultation that I'll do the delivery with Dr Rituperna only.

Over the course of my pregnancy she was supportive, kind and gave a lot of her time in every consultation and always comforted me.

During the delivery also she was never worried and never flustered. She always insisted from the first moment that we will go for normal delivery and never pressured me into anything. 

Post delivery care was also top notch. I loved every aspect of my pregnancy under Dr Rituperna. I will gladly recommend her to anyone and if I have another baby I will choose her with my eyes closed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Consulted Ritu Mam for NVD.
We have consulted Ritu Mam by seeing the reviews in Google for my first pregnancy. That was a superb journey with her. In short as per her guidance, delivered a baby with just 6hrs of labour through NVD.
 Then again consulted Ritu Mam after 2.5 years for not getting pregnancy then she did some scans and found that there was a cyst near the uterus. Then she did laparoscopic cystectomy, and assured that I will get pregnancy for sure, then we tried for pregnancy after few months and got the results positive.
Then started the 2nd pregnancy journey with her from the day I got to know that I was conceived. This time everything was gone smoothly. But found that my baby was in breech position. I was worried because of the breech presentation of a baby. But Mam had a strong belief that baby would turn to normal position. For that she suggested some excercises. In the next scan baby turned little bit and was in the transverse position. And she suggested me to continue the same exercises. Finally baby head is down. Seriously I was very worried about the position of baby. But mam was confident enough that baby will turn. Her words and the explanation helps to reduce the stress of pregnancy. Finally the labour day came and got delivered a baby with just around 2hrs of labour.
There might lot of best doctor are there but for me *** ** *** **** ** *** **** ******* And like a goddess. 
Her explanation about the things and her friendly nature makes her different from other doctors and keep her in a step above. That gives more confidence and support.

Thanks a lot Ritu Mam for supporting and for NVD.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility,PCOS,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: A friend referred me to Dr. Ritu . I visited her for PCOS treatment followed by pregnancy . We conceived within 4 months of the treatment . Dr. Ritu is the best thing that has happened to us . I am in awe of her patience and dedication she has for her patients . Just commendable !¬†We had certain age related complications during the early stage of pregnancy but Dr.¬† was very open to us about the issues and the next course of treatment/tests. She monitored me thoroughly throughout the pregnancy and ensured everything was in control . *** *** *** ********* *** *********** ********** ** ***** **On the day of delivery , the doctor was regularly checking on me through WhatsApp and visited me several times to check if I was ready for the NVD . After the delivery , she visited me at 4:30am to see if I was doing ok.¬† The best thing which I have never seen any other doctor do is , Dr Ritu texted me a week after the discharge to check on my wellbeing . I am her fan after this gesture of hers' . Truly a gem and a wonderful gynaecologist one can trust for any gynaec and pregnancy related issues. We are immensely grateful to her for helping us bring our lovely daughter into this world !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Ritu doctor is very friendly ,she addresses our questions with patience and explains very well.The treatment she does is very satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ********* ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* I have contacted her for delayed period, fortunately after going to clinic got confirmation like I have conceived. 
Since beginning doctor never suggested any extra tests or checkups. Only regular checkup along with basic medication she suggested. She is very friendly and listened to all my concerns patiently and never gave any false suggestions. During ninth month checkup, she told normal delivery chances are high and luckily I got normal delivery also.
Both baby and myself are doing good. Thanks to Rituparna doctor and I highly recommend her for any pregnancy related treatments.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review: My initial conception was ectopic.I was not able to conceive after my colleague informed us about Dr. Ritu, we decided to seek a second opinion from Doctor.In our first visit,Doctor gathered all medical history described the plan of action to be followed for four months, and recommended some medication based on our health conditions. We followed the directions for two months,and conceived naturally in the third month.During our visits in the journey of  pregnancy, she gave us thorough explanations of everything. She was able to evaluate my health and provide me with all the required guidance and advice,which was incredibly helpful. When it comes to the patient's diagnosis and treatment, she is amiable yet competent. In an emergency, the doctor has always been reachable, even through WhatsApp, to address our queries. I gave birth to a boy baby doctor focus was to go with normal delivery, I have not met a doctor who approaches their patients with such assurance, warmth, and the appropriate mindset. We are grateful to the doctor, without whom we would not have had such a challenging pregnancy. And the journey going on positive vibe with happiness strongly advise and suggest to the community looking for a Gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would like express my gratitude to Dr.Ritu for everything through my review. She is one of the finest Gynecologists I have ever come across.

Right from the starting of my pregnancy we held our little bundle she was guiding us through every step. She has never prescribed any extra medications nor scared us with negativity and medical conditions. Doctor kept motivating me and knew what she was doing for her patients.

Her dedication, availability, guidance and unwavering support throughout every step of our pregnancy is exceptional. Her expertise is Top-Notch, her empathy and calmness made her different from the others.

We are immensely grateful to have Dr.Ritu on our beautiful journey of parenthood. If you are looking for the best gynaecologist, look no further as Dr. Ritu is by far the best gynaecologist in the city without any doubt and from personal experience. Wishing ma'am all the best and all the blessings from God!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Laparoscopic Surgery (Obs & Gyn),Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pregnancy Scan,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review:
I had an unfortunate early miscarriage. From that point I was not conceiving even after consulting many doctors. I was mentally prepared to do IVF, and then we were lucky to meet Dr. Rituparna. She carefully checked my medical history and advised us to determine the root cause before going for such expensive treatments. After few months of medication, she performed a diagnostic hysterolaparoscopy and explained me the issues. We understood that even if I can conceive naturally, the chances are less.

Eventually I went through IVF treatment from a renowned IVF center in Bangalore. Dr. Rituparna was always in touch and watched over the process. Unfortunately, the treatment did not work out. However, we did not lose hope and continued the treatment with Dr. Ritu. She changed few medications based on the previous tests and feedback, and I conceived naturally at the end. But the things again got complicated due to some issues in the first trimester. Dr. Ritu took utmost care in solving the problem, timely scanning and checkup, antenatal care and delivery of the baby.

Dr. Rituparna is an excellent doctor and amazing human being. She patiently listens and discusses every problem with minute details, explains the problems and each medicine she prescribes. Above all, she gave us lots of confidence every time we visited her.

I will definitely recommend Dr. Rituparna to each and every one reading this review.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was suffering from PCOD since the time I attained puberty at the age of 11. I have been married for 10 years now and we have been trying to conceive since the second year of marriage. I consulted many doctors in various streams of medicines like ayurveda, homeopathy and allopathy. I also underwent the laparoscopic surgery to burn few ovarian cysts. All the doctors I consulted were focused on ovarian induction and conception. None of them focused on curing the underlying issue of PCOD. We moved to HBR layout in Bangalore and started looking for a good gynecologist again. We found about Dr. Rituparna Beria Sarkar through Google reviews and decided to consult her. From day one of consultation, her approach towards the treatment was logical and convincing. The way she interacted with the patients was very welcoming and friendly. She patiently heard to all our concerns and explained the line of treatment clearly. While all other doctors inclined towards IVF, Dr. Ritu was very clear that we will go for IVF as a last option. She targeted the core issue, PCOD directly through medication. We were able to conceive in just a few months of treatment, but it was a failed conception. But Dr. Ritu filled us with hope and positivity. We were able to conceive again through IUI within about 18 months of treatment with Dr. Ritu and we are blessed with a baby girl now. Even for delivery, her focus was to do a normal delivery until the last minute.

review:
I cannot express enough gratitude for the incredible care and support I received throughout my entire pregnancy journey with Dr. Rituparna Bera.
Dr. Rituparna Bera not only provided exceptional medical care but also took the time to listen attentively to all of my concerns and questions, 
ensuring that I felt empowered and informed every step of the way.From my first visit to when I had my baby, Dr. Rituparna Bera was really good at her job and caring too. 
Thanks to her guidance and encouragement, I was able to achieve the natural birth experience that I had hoped for, and I will forever be grateful for her expertise and guidance.
I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a caring and understanding doctor for their pregnancy journey.

review:
Dr. Rituparna Mam is an exceptional gynecologist who has profoundly impacted my health and well-being. From my very first appointment, she established a welcoming and supportive environment where I felt comfortable discussing even the most sensitive topics. Dr. Rituparna Mam's expertise and professionalism are evident in her thorough evaluations and personalized treatment plans. She takes the time to listen attentively to my concerns and provides clear explanations and guidance every step of the way.

What truly sets Dr. Rituparna Mam apart is her compassionate approach to patient care. She genuinely cares about her patient's overall health and takes a holistic approach to treatment, considering both physical and emotional aspects.

Dr. Rituparna Mam's commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect of her practice, from the state-of-the-art treatment to her attentive team of staffs. Thus resulted me in giving a Vaginal Birth to a Healthy Girl Baby. 

I am incredibly grateful to have Dr. Rituparna Mam as my gynecologist and highly recommend her to anyone seeking compassionate and comprehensive gynecological care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Doctor Ritu parna for our first baby. Both of us are not Bangalore based. So initially we were hesitant to deliver in Bangalore as we were informed that doctors here aren‚Äôt patient enough to do normal delivery. After various research, we came across dr Ritu Parna profile in google with lot of good reviews, and as it was listed nearby our house, so we thought to give a try. To our utter satisfaction from day 1 she greeted and welcomed us with a smile. She is patient enough, doesn‚Äôt rush through, she clarifies all your doubts. Most importantly she informs what is only needed to be known. Even though I ask the silliest or dumbest questions she doesn‚Äôt shy away but answers them mockingly. She is so dedicated to her job that not one day have we seen her take leave or report late. From morning to late evening, she is in clinic and late nights to and fro to hospitals delivering babies. She is a passionate doc who seems to work round the clock. I have never seen a doctor with such true dedication and sincerity. She doesn‚Äôt charge you with lot of tests or scans especially gives tablets which are only necessary. I was low on vitamin d asked her to prescribe tablet she refused and insisted that I get enough sunlight. I had few complications low lying placenta, low amniotic fluid and growth restriction but she didn‚Äôt not scare me with any of these conditions, in fact when I felt so low and negative, she scolded me to see things positively. She suggested me only walking because of my complications and when baby was nearing full term and when most of conditions were eradicated, she suggested few exercises for normal delivery which I couldn‚Äôt do full-fledged due to my weight gain and knee pain. On my labour day, she took wise decision of enabling me to undergo most of the pain at the comfort of my home and when the intensity increased only then I was admitted in hospital and doc irrespective of her sickness rushed to the hospital exactly at the time when my labour kick started. To conclude in a line, Doc Ritu is an answered prayer. My prayer was that I should be guided by a doctor who doesn‚Äôt intervene medically or scientifically in the beautiful art of the Lords hands raising a new life from the womb to the world, painlessly. And yes, I delivered naturally almost without much pain as I was blessed by God to undergo precipitated labour within one and half hours my baby girl was in my hands. Thank you doc, you are a God sent angel who had delivered my baby. Never seen such a doctor who is humble, down to earth and sweet person by heart who doesn‚Äôt show-off. Keep up the good work doc!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr. Rituparna for PCOD treatment and pregnancy planning. We decided that Dr. Ritu is going to be our doctor for our pregnancy journey at the first consultation.Dr. Ritu clearly explained us the problem and course of plan for the treatment, she never hurried upon things and always took one step at time and was very passionate in what she was doing.The treatment began with few lifestyle changes and few medications that Dr. Ritu had prescribed. During the initial few days, it wasn't easy for me to do adopt to the lifestyle modifications that doctor had suggested but she kept motivating and encouraging me to push harder with few simple suggestions, these suggestions which helped me to make the lifestyle changes.As some cysts were still persistent and was not supporting us to conceive, doctor suggested us Ovulation Induction(OI) for conception. There started our pregnancy journey, in two months of OI, I luckily conceived. From there on doctor guided me all the blood tests and scans to be performed, on a timely basis she explained what test/scan had to be done and for what and no unnecessary test/scan was prescribed. Things were going as expected uptill the seventh month of pregnancy, during the growth scan in the seventh month doctor diagnosied that there was a growth restriction in the baby due to a restriction in blood flow. This made us to panic and were not clear on the next steps, doctor understood what we were going through and helped us to understand the situation and not to panic and told us that she is there to handle it and she will take care of it. Then just to rule out any anamolies in the scan, doctor suggested us to repeat the scan in 1-2 different centers over a time range of 1-2 weeks. When those scan reports too diagnosied growth restriction, doctor counselled us on the next steps and kept me in close monitoring where I was sending daily fetal movement counts directly to doctor. So it was clear by now that I was not going to complete my entire pregnancy term as it was going to very risky for my baby, at the same time doctor was also not in favour of delivering the baby immediately even though there was growth restriction to the baby inside me. She told us that it is better for the baby to stay inside than to deliver it early, as long as it not concerning any danger to the baby and the mother. She prolonged the baby's stay inside for a few more weeks with close monitoring and started few medications parallely for organ development for the baby, as we expected an early delivery. Just when the blood flow restriction was starting to deteriorate, doctor asked me to get admitted immediately and kept me under close observation. This deterioration was still not causing any harm to the baby or me yet, so she was trying to prolong the delivery by few more hours so that baby gets somemore time inside me. After a few hours of close observation in the hospital, doctor advised the right time for delivey and after our consent she delivered me by a C-Section to welcome a baby boy. After a few days of medical attention to the baby at the hospital, during which too Dr.Ritu kept following up on the baby's health with both us as well as the pediatricians taking care of the baby. We are now a happy family with our first child.We thank Dr. Rituparna for all the attention and care she has shown on us, for explaining and clearing our doubts by taking enough time during our consultations in spite of other patients waiting for their turn. We started our journey with Dr. Rituparna as a patient, now we feel like we have a sister or a friend who is there to care for us. We wish Dr. Rituparna the best as she continues to serve many more expectant parents like us. We wish the very best to the new parents to be as well.

review:
Thanks a lot Doctor Rituparna for all your Support , Guidance and Help.

Finally our day came on 29-Sep-2022 and have our Baby in Our Hands. In Fact we got our day when my Wife's Pregnancy confirmed 8 months back.

We used to consult another Doctor in September 2020 and it continued for a year with 4/5 Scans in a month to check Egg Growth, then Ovulation Induction Medication, Progesterone , Estrogen , lot of Medication and Tests which didn't help us and which results lot of health issues and lot of mental stress , Finally lost the hope on Pregnancy. Next suggestion was to go for IUI which we didn't want to go and took break for 3 months.

After taking 3 months gap , Due to delay in Menstrual Cycle , decided to consult some other Doctor.

That time we have gone through the reviews in Practo and decided to consult Doctor Rituparna.

On the First day of Consultation with Doctor Rituparna , Doctor told no need to worry if you are getting Menstrual cycle within 45 days and that statement gave us a big relief. (This statement was very helpful that time as when we were consulting with previous Doctor, we used to go for 4/5 times scan within a month and have medicine prescribed to skip the current cycle & to move on to the next cycle in case the Egg Size is not as expected atleast by 18th day and expectation was max 30-35 days of Menstrual Cycle)

On the first day of our consultation with the Doctor Rituparna , By seeing the previous reports , Doctor explained what could be the reasons from my end & my wife's end and prescribed as below..


1. Wait till 45th day from last menstrual date and then have one Tablet to get the Period (if not getting period in 45 days) & move to next cycle.
2. In case get the next cycle before 45th day , Start using one tablet for PCOS & Egg quality for my wife and one Tablet for me. 
3. Doctor told to follow this medication for 3 months.

On following the above , Within 2 months ,  My wife's pregnancy is confirmed without any other unnecesaary medication/tests/treatment.

And Doctor Ritu always ...
1. Have patience to listen all our problems/doubts
2. Spends more time during  consultation to explain the problem and the possible solution
3. Friendly and Can talk freely on our doubts.
4. Suggests required Medication and not excess 
Medication
5. Provides Whatsapp Message support on any doubts
6. Reachable on Phone from 7th Month Pregnancy in case of any Emergnecy
7.Time Panctual  
8. Sugget only required tests 

And all the Staff in Ritu Women's Clinic is very supportive and polite.

Thank you very much Doctor for all your support and guidance throughout our journey.

Thank you very much to Doctor's entire team for all the timely support.

Thank you is very small word for your help Doctor. Wishing you all the happiness in your life and your family.

We highly recommend Doctor Rituparna for any Ganecology and Pregnancy related Problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After couple of years sitting out at home due to pandemic, I wished to become a mother again at the age of 38.
When my test came positive, We searched for top Gynecologist nearby and on Practo we found Dr Rituparna.
Going through all the stories on Practo about Dr. Rituparna, we finalised her and booked one appointment. On our first visit , Dr. noted down all my details and explained us very nicely about all the DOs and DONTs in the early pregnancy.  From 2nd visit onwards She remembered all our past discussion and also explained need of few Tests due to my age but never asked for any unnecessary test.  I liked the way she extended personal touch all the time and most of the time I felt like I was speaking with a friend or a family member rather than a Dr.  After 7 months she gave me her personal number and asked me to reach out to her for any issues. 
Since then whenever i messaged her, she definitely replied however busy she was.  She asked me to message baby count everyday to her and I did so and whenever I missed to update her, she proactively messaged me to check if everything was ok.  She also suggested natural therapy for any other health related issues in his period. 
She always motivated me to go for Normal delivery but as my first one was C-section, I was bit sceptical and hence I discussed this topic in many of my visits but we could not decide until one day I felt baby movement reduced and hence went for urgent checkup. Dr scanned and found that all of sudden my water level reduced due to excessive dehydration caused by fever and suggested me to get admitted. Hence I got admitted at OVUM. Doctor explained that she would try to delay the operation as that time baby was 35+ weeks and was not mature.
After a day i took discharge as treatment showed encouraging sign. We followed doctor's suggestion and went for GTT scan and went to see the doctor with the report next day . This time doctor repeated my scan at clinic and did a matching of the same with GTT report and concluded the further delay could be harmful for baby . Hence after days I got admitted and delivered a baby boy at OVUM Hospital . Even though It was C-Section and I started walking next day and literally felt good next day thanks to Dr. Rituparna for her expert handling of the difficult case timely with easy and confidence. 
As baby was not mature and diagonised with Jaundice, we had to stay back in hospital for few more days for his treatment but Dr. used to visit me everyday at least once a day to check recovery and enquired about the baby.  I am really thankful to her for guiding me delivering my little bundle of joy safely. God bless you and your team and I pray that you continue helping would be parents with your skill and empathy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I don't know where to begin, Every pregnant mother have different journey.I am lucky I met Dr Ritu Parna Madam .With regular consultation and guidance I delivered a baby boy on 01 May 22.She helped me each and every phase of this pregnancy journey. one of my friend referred me to her .I am staying at Kadubesanahalli which is 18 kms from her Clinic so everyday Used to travel almost 36 kms in Bangalore traffic to just come and meet Ritu Parna Madam and get ensured every thing is going well. In initial consultation she made me to aware how many test and why it is required. No unnecessary test .she also mentioned which is mandatory and which is optional test. Best thing in house ultrasound machine and lab/pharmacy .every time you visit and you don't need to run here and there for test and medicines.My blood haemoglobin level was low 10.4 and with her advice and medicine it was reached to 13.4.Second hurdle,she diagnosed and found nuchal cord rapped around baby neck,she asked me to track baby movements in a particular time and also shared her emergency contact details.Nuchal cord got off from neck after few months .She was tracking down baby growth in every visit and flagged for any abnormalities and area of improvement.She clearly mentioned in last month of pregnancy cervix is too firm and there might be chances of prolonged labour pain. On Final day when labour pain started I pinged her and she asked me to get admitted in hospital .She came to hospital and examined me.Labour pain lasted for more than 11 hrs in Hospital,I asked her to do C section.she said then why you wasted 11 hrs and again encourage me for Normal Delivery. 

When C section is trend nowadays even though she encourage for Normal Delivery.

After I delivered a baby boy ,Dr Ritu Parna Madam used to visit every day at Hospital till my last date of discharge and she used to asked  me and my Lil one well being and used to suggest usefull advice for reducing pain and swelling.

I am going to miss Dr Ritu Ma'am and her loving staff.each visit to her Clinic was like going to meet family member.

She suggested Ovum Hospital which was really amazing as no one came from my family so me and my husband had to manage everything.Due to her support and supportive nurses everything was so memorable for me.

Hospital Physiotherapist came and said Dr Ritu Madam means only normal Vaginal delivery.
Dr Ritu Parna Madam is sweet , trustworthy, knowledgeable and explain everything clearly with logic.
"Affordable and best treatment"
I will refer my friends to this clinic.
My greatest pleasure to meet Dr Ritu Madam and making this journey memorable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
From PINK to BLUE, Dr. Rituparna was with us! 

I remember the day, when I took the pregnancy test and it came PINK. We were very happy, for obvious reasons. We went to see Dr. Rituparna on the same day and she explained us very nicely about all the DOs and DONT's in the early pregnancy which is very important to know these days due to our lifestyles. 

After, our first consulation, with Dr. Rituparna, Me and my husband decided that we will continue with the same Dr. throughout as we felt very comfortable talking to her and most importantly her detaied explanation and assurance to me being pregnant for the first time. 

Dr. Rituparna is a fine mix of care and caution. I loved the way she gave me that personal touch all the time. Felt like a care from a family member. Also she cautioned me at times on the DONT'S - don't eat junk food/ don't let your weight increase beyond certain level and explained the reasons behind them. 

Dr. Rituparna never asked me to do any unnecessary tests nor scared me Into doing one. With all her instructions and advices, it all went well. 

We came to 9th month of pregnancy. Our visits frequency stated increasing as the date was closer. In 9th month, minor complications were observed like a little decline in baby's heart rate, CPR ratio bit below required range etc. Dr. Rituparna assured that she'll not do the delivery until it's time. And we knew we can trust Dr. 100%.
15 days past 8 months, in one of the routine tests, while doing NST. at Dr.'s clinic, baby's heart rate started dipping gradually due to the umbilical cord being tied around baby's neck. 
It could have been very serious for our baby had we not visited that day for our routine check up. I remember Dr. Rituparna came running upon listening to the drop in the heart rate volume and immediately asked us to get admitted for a C section delivery. 

The same day, 05th Jan 2022, with God's blessings & Dr. Rituparna's experience in handling complex situations, we got the news of BLUE. We were blessed with a lovely baby boy. Perfectly alright. Absolutely no issues at all. My baby and me were doing all good. 

I don't know if I thanked Dr. Rituparna for her quick identification of the issue and suggesting us to get admitted and get the delivery done, but me and my husband personally feel, that at such times sometimes each and every day counts. One day late and things can go south. 

I've heard, sometimes, some parents don't listen to Doctors when it comes to C section deliveries and then later regret after a mishap due to complication. But i think we should NEVER ignore what our doctors advice. 

Me & my husband didn't ignore the advice and today we have our baby healthy in our hands. All due to Dr. Rituparna. 

She's a gem of a doctor. I recommend Dr. Rituparna for all your Gynaec issues. ***** *** **** *** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were visiting Manipal hospitals for an year including the time before conception for tests and guidance. After my wife concieved, we were looking to consult a doctor who is committed to performing normal delivery as first priority. We were worried about the current state in which doctors look for reasons to do c section as over the time its price has shot up. At this point i came to know about Dr. Rituparna from a friend who stays near hennur who got his baby delivered normally with her help. I was moved by his experience with Dr. Rituparna and hence despite the Distance being more from home to Dr visit  compared to going to Manipal, i chose to consult Dr. Rituparna. It was a very refreshing and a congineal experience. We never felt like speaking to a doctor but rather felt like speaking to a friend. We got in touch in 8th month and since then whenever we visited her, she would explain everything in detail and with various examples to make us understand the situation. It was clearly visible that the advices she use to give us were keeping in mind that we need normal delivery. The choices of medicines, exercices everything was explained in detail and she use to always council us on questions we have which gave us peace of mind and only wait for the day. My wife's water broke 3 weeks before delivery date and we contacted Dr. Ritu on phone. She was quick to respond and asked to come to hospital. My wife was loosing the water frequently even when she was walking or moving but had no pain. In this situation c section was very justifiable, but still she said we ll try our best to do normal delivery. For which she asked to make no movements and gave her medicines to induce pain. In next 8 hours the dilation happened until 8cm when my wife was moved to labour room. My wife wasn't able to push enough and the baby was at the same stage for 90minutes with the head out of the dilation. Slowly the heart rate and breathing of the baby started to drop. At this stage c section was not possible and vacuuming also was not possible as the baby got some swelling on his head already. A team along with 4-5 doctors and nurses helped my wife to deliver normally and at the right time. The baby was moved to NICU straight where he recovered and was discharged after 1.5 days. My wife is also recovering gradually. We finally got a normal delivery despite a bit of complexity. Many people might say many things but that day i was in the labour room and realised why doctors are compared with God. She gave life to both, my wife and kid. We can't thanks Dr. Rituparna enough for her efforts. I would personally recommend her to my friends.

review:
I recently had the pleasure of being under the care of Dr. Rituparna Bera throughout my pregnancy journey, leading up to a successful normal delivery. I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care and support she provided during this crucial time.

Dr. Bera's professionalism and expertise were evident from our first consultation. She took the time to thoroughly explain every aspect of my pregnancy, making sure I felt informed and comfortable with the process. Her warm and compassionate demeanor immediately put me at ease, fostering a sense of trust and confidence in her abilities.

Throughout the prenatal care, Dr. Bera exhibited a genuine concern for both my physical and emotional well-being. She consistently listened attentively to my questions and concerns, addressing each with patience and clarity. Her commitment to personalized care made me feel like more than just a patient; I felt valued and heard at every appointment.

As the due date approached, Dr. Bera's meticulous planning and attention to detail became even more evident. She guided me through the labor and delivery process with a calm and reassuring presence. Her expertise and skill were crucial in ensuring a smooth and successful normal delivery. I am immensely grateful for her dedication to the well-being of both me and my baby.

Beyond her medical proficiency, Dr. Rituparna Bera's commitment to patient education stood out. She provided valuable information about postpartum care, breastfeeding, and general well-being, empowering me to navigate the early days of motherhood with confidence.

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Rituparna Bera to any expectant mother seeking a knowledgeable, compassionate, and dedicated gynecologist. Her unwavering commitment to patient care, coupled with her friendly and approachable nature, make her an outstanding healthcare professional. I am truly grateful for the positive experience I had under her care, and I trust that others will find the same level of excellence in their journey with Dr. Bera.

Thank you, Dr. Bera, for your outstanding service and for being an integral part of this joyous chapter in my life.

review:
We walked into Dr.Ritu‚Äôs clinic in Hennur on a Saturday for a checkup nearby our house and the doctor revealed to us that my wife is carrying our 3rd child. It was a pleasant surprise and our journey along with Dr. Ritu started from that day. We had no prior recommendations or seen any review to consult with Dr. Ritu. The first visit gave us the confidence to continue the pregnancy journey with her.

We had a tumultuous journey during the pregnancy. The scan revealed high NT value suspected for high probability of abnormality in the baby. All along Dr.Ritu was rock solid with our decision to continue in each stage providing valuable inputs and treatments. She recommended us the Marker and NIPT tests to have healthy baby.

There were complications due to low hemoglobin and age adding another factor. Dr. Ritu provides only relevant medicines and does the scans herself. Major scans she refers outside. Every month the progress of baby's growth was observed and my wife‚Äôs health and diet were continuously tracked. Under Dr.Ritu‚Äôs expert consultation and medicine it was all sorted out with significant improvements during the entire pregnancy .

Dr.Ritu is soft spoken, humble, confident and answers up to the point crisp and clear. This gives us the complete scenario understanding and giving us the confidence to proceed.

During the delivery phase, she gives options of multiple hospitals and we can select the appropriate hospital nearby the house. We had the delivery in Altius Hospital and she was there daily for the rounds. There was adhesions in the uterus to the stomach from the previous delivery and Dr.Ritu with her team in Altius ensured the adhesions were removed taking maximum care during the delivery process.

We were blessed with a healthy Baby Boy bringing a huge relief to us.

Dr. Ritu even visited us on Sunday assuring my wife on recovery process and infact she was more happy than us seeing my wife deliver a healthy baby boy and the recovery progress of my wife.

From the initial consultation to the delivery of my baby, the experience was nothing but exceptional. We highly recommend Dr Ritu for Gynaecology and Pregnancy even with high complications. She handles the difficult situations with confidence and positive results is rest assured.

The staff in her clinic Sandhya, Sunanda and Narasimha were very helpful always with smile on their face

Long story in short "Recommend Dr. Ritu for high complication pregnancy"

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Rituparna is the best advisor you will get in this entire town.

She has been a great support for us in this entire journey. Transitioning from worried couple to excited parents was way too easier for us under her guidance.
Talking about her consultation fee and the medicine she prescribes, is way too cheaper than you would even believe. Dr. Rituparna's clinic is simply a one-stop shop for all your maternity needs.

We will always be grateful to her, that she helped us achieve our new roles in the best way possible! And equally grateful to God, that we were able to connect with Dr. Ritu at the time of our need.
Thanks once again!!!

review: Firstly dr ritu is more than doctor. .angel who enlightens so many patients with her smile.we were trying for pregnancy for 1 year and had some issues so we decided to consult her based on the practo reviewsvery first moment we met her during December 2022 had so much confidence she told we will go natural process and started with minimal medications, we got pregnancy confirmed on April 2023.I must say she has magic or the touch to make it happen so hereafter our pregnancy journey started and it was not smooth we had High risk pregnancy like borderline glucose test but dr ritu always assured we would gostep by step before concluding everything and the way she handled pregnancy journey filling confidence on me and my husband ,she recommended all the dietary changes during pregnancyRitu mam boosted confidence for Normal delivery and we got admitted for the delivery on Dec 22 for Labour pain pain was unbearable but she was constantly monitored the NST baby heartbeat and all other parameters throught out night I had almost given up and wanted to go for C-section then Ritu mam spoke with me and motivated me for the natural pain, so finally with the magic touch after 13 hours of labor pain i delivered My angel girl baby on Dec 23ü©∑Without Ritu Mam support we would not be able to make it so far and thanks would be  very small word for All the support and care she takes during pregnancy is commendable.üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Throughout my entire pregnancy, I had the immense pleasure of being under the care of such an outstanding gynecologist. From the very first appointment she established a warm and welcoming atmosphere and ensured that i felt comfortable.
She communicates clearly and provides thorough explanation ( without even asking - something that I always look out for in a doctor) , addressing any questions or concerns I had along the way. You can openly discuss your fears or anxiety with her.
Regular checkups were done with strong attention to detail and giving detailed explanation of purpose and outcome of any tests that were done in the entire pregnancy period. She ensured that I ate healthy, exercised regularly to keep my and the growing baby's weight in check and also that I can have normal delivery. 
2-3 weeks before delivery, she started with exercises that would help me with normal delivery. She communicated clearly that at times the decisions are dynamic and needs to be taken proactively (for the sake of baby and mother). 
On the day of my delivery¬†, when i was admitted in the hospital for normal delivery, the pain was unbearable and i was vomiting, she kept a tab on me, reached out to me to ensure that I get the required care. But, I had to undergo Cesarean section (since the baby passed motion inside the womb), she ensured that I was responding well during the operation. 
Even after my delivery, she responds whenever I reach out to her for any concerns (though she has a busy schedule). Her staff/team is also very warm and helpful. 

Thank you for being such a wonderful person and a great doctor :)
reply_text: Thanks a ton. All the best for new parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Day when we got to know through pregnancy kit we were clueless and it was weekend as everyone does we started to check in Google and was amazed with the reviews and tried to reach the clinic and was informed please do come on Monday. From the time we stepped into the clinic I had a positive vibes and inner feelings the time I saw the wall sticker "Dreamy girl with flying colourful butterflies". I was touched by the way they greeted us and advised each and every step from the Sandhya sister with warm welcoming smile and guiding us I never felt i have come to hospital and next Udaya sister knowledgeable girl who knows to take care of the patients and counseling in each and every stage and sharing lot of positive words and thoughts to my wife. Before we met the doctor my wife is completely scared about clinic and hospitals, however the day we met Rituparna Doctor it's truly amazing experience the way doctor spoke to us giving a clear picture of the present situation and being candid the most important thing give equal attention to all the patients and spending the quality of time in explaining and guiding the patients. Wife was checked and was informed stating it's a symptom of early pregnancy and has 4 cysts which can be a problem however no need to worry and was provided with medication and was advised to come for the next visit. when we visited the doctor for 2nd time it's a miracle that none of the cysts were visible that really showed the confidence and experience of the doctor and every time we visited the clinic we never felt that we are meeting the doctor we felt we are meeting our friends or relatives and from then we never thought so soon the 9 months passed and we are blessed with the prince in hands of Dr. Rituparna. I would like to take this moment and thank everyone in the clinic for their energy, patience and enthusiasm for each and every patient. No matter who asks me for any Gyne Doctor without doubt it would be our Dr. Rituparna.Last but not least never to forget the Sunandha sister who is closely working with the Doctor and gaining all the experience she's truly an inspiring girl for the people who visit the clinic.We can assure you until there is a critical issue the doctor doesn't suggest for Surgery and Dr. Rituparna always suggests and 100% guides patients for Normal Delivery always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** **** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ** *** *** **** ** *** *** **** *** *****

She is most affectionate and attentive doctor where we came across.

Let me put in our journey with doctor here..

We visited Dr. Ritu Parna for my wife's menstrual irregularities and PCOD problem.
When we first visited the doctor, we gave all the previous records and reports. Mam considered all those and never repeated any tests which were already present. She started the treatment from that point.

Dr. Ritu Parna treated with minimum medication and conducted scans which were only absolutely required. She always insisted my wife to change in lifestyle (proper exercise and diet plan). After sometime my wife conceived.

During our entire pregnancy journey doctor treated my wife with utmost caring and guiding us through all the stages. She suggested all the exercises and plan to do for normal delivery (NVD). Madam used to be in personal contact with us during final months and used to observe daily fetal movements

For Delivery we admitted in hospital and in prior to this Doctor explained in detail about the procedure which they would be following. As baby's head position was not fixed due to more fluid, Doctor did ARM to reduce the fluid and suggested that after getting significant 4 hours of pain baby's head position will get fixed. After 3 hours, duty doctors checked the baby's head position as it was still high they've made arrangements for Caesarean section delivery and moved to OT, but once Dr. Ritu Parna arrived she checked and understood that head position was about to get fixed. So she moved my wife back to labor room and she did normal delivery (NVM) within 15 minutes.

I honestly didn't have confidence that my wife will be able to pull the normal delivery. but thanks to Dr. Ritu Parna, with her support my wife was able to do it.

Finally i can say one thing, Dr. Ritu Parna is a wonderful human being before being a good Gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Ritu mam after 6th month of my pregnancy as i was looking for a good doctor to assist and guide my pregnancy journey. I had gone through the review on internet and gave a thought to try. And trust me, that was the best decision i made though i had to travel a distance of 20km to see doctor from my house everytime.
On my first visit, doctor systematically collected all my information and previous scan details and she prepared a antenetal profile and one would really need lot of patience to do that and believe me i have never met a doctor before who would invest so much time in a patient. She patiently listens to all your concerns and gives the best advice in a most simple language that anybody can understand. She clearly explains the thing sometimes with a diagram too :)
I was diabetic during pregnancy and she motivated me very well to keep my sugar under control explaining the consequences which can be caused in case i m not within the range. Doctor is extremely friendly and you can talk to her openly about any of your concern and you can expect the most satisfactory reaction from her in return.
The fees that doctor charges for consultation is very less compared to rest gynecologists and its very difficult to find such a good doctor and its definitely value.
Doctor never suggested for any unnecessary scans. She will herself perform most of the scans at reasonable price and hence you need not visit other labs. She will never force you to go for C section if NVD is possible. In my case, NVD was possible but i opted for elective C section as i was worried about my health concers - wheezing and diabetes.
Finally, i delivered a beautiful baby girl on 14th October by C section, Ritu mam was the one who performed the procedure and whole thing took less than 15 mins and i was able to see my angel immediately. I did not face any consequence due to surgery and my baby is doing good as well.
I would definitely recommend Ritu mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
With great satisfaction and happiness, I am writing this review for Dr. Ritu Parna Mam, as it should be helpful for those looking to find the right doctor for their pregnancy consultation. Our gym trainer recommended visiting Mam's clinic once, and we started following up with Ritu Mam from day one after the positive pregnancy test.

I am delighted and grateful that we chose Dr. Ritu Mam for my pregnancy and delivery. I admire her professionalism and the way she carries herself so beautifully dressed. She is very experienced, very friendly, cheerful, and full of energy as a person. Mam is one of the busiest doctors who never leaves her smile behind even though she works 24/7 for her patients. She was there patiently clearing all my doubts and gave us a stress-free relationship with her during consultations. She is a great listener, very concerned about her patient's well-being, and approachable at any time. She is always available to clarify any doubts through Whatsapp, even late at night, and answers call even in her busy schedule.

With Mam's support and guidance, I was relaxed and smiling while entering the operation theatre and came out smiling after giving birth to a healthy baby girl. She takes care of their patients with the utmost care, so people are connected to Mam more as a friend than as a patient-doctor relationship.

I thoroughly enjoyed my pregnancy journey with her and felt blessed to hold my beautiful little angel on August 15th in Ovum HRBR Layout Branch. After delivery, she helped alleviate my fears when I had low milk production in the initial week. Mam, Thank you so much for everything; she will always be in my prayers. She will keep shining and help as many people as possible ‚Äì I am sure she will. I am very blessed to meet Mam. No words to thank Mam. May God bless her and her family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I moved to bangalore during my seventh month of pregnnacy. I did a Google search to find a good gynaecologist near me and first reference I got was of Dr. Rituparna Sarkar. The reviews were very nice so i decided to have a consultation with her. During my first visit I was a little sceptical about it but all my uneasyness just vanished when we first met her. She was very friendly and we never felt like we are meeting her for the first time. It was like we are having a conversation with our family doctor. She went through all our previous reports and scans and advised us accordingly. I had missed my anamoly scan of fifth month and we were very tensed as after fifth month, scans can't determine if the baby has any kind of issues or not. But she has assured us that she will make sure a pediatrician does a through check up of the baby once the child is born. This increased our trust and confidence in her. She gave us her personal number on which I was supposed to send her daily featal movement count and whenever I missed to send it, she used to send me a reminder message proactively from her side. I wanted to have  a normal delivery but i knew it was difficult as my first delivery was a C section. During the end of ninth month, she prolonged my delivery for one week so that we can atleast try for normal delivery but at the same time keeping a tab on my condition as well as on the condition of the baby. But two days before my EDD, my water broke and she advised me to get admitted in the Ovum hospital. There also she waited for 4-5 hours to check if I get the labor pain nturally as they can't giveme any medicine to induce the pain. As the water level was reducing and I was not getting the pain naturally, she advised us that we should not wait for more and we decided to go for the C section only. The baby was fine and healthy. Post delivery she used visit the hospital twice a day to check how I and my baby are doing. I started walking from next day of surgery itself under her guidance. I will be thankful to her for making this whole process very easy for me in a completely new city. I would definitely recommend her for all your pregnacy related issues. You will be in good hands, that's for sure üôÇ
reply_text: Thanks dear Rashmi.  Enjoy the parenthood..

review: I and my husband were really in dilemma as we were not satisfied with the response from a gynaecologist near our home, then we searched in google and found Dr Ritu, as there were many positive feedbacks and we as well wanted the best doctor in the city to guide us throughout the pregnancy journey, we visited Dr Ritu on the same day and the way she explained things and her polite, humble nature made us very easy to decide to which Dr we need to consult further. However during the mid 8th month my Amniotic Fluid was around 8cm which was worrisome but by the medication given by Dr Ritu it also got increased...At the time of delivery I was not able to bear the labor pain and requested Dr to please do the c-section and my husband also lost hope that I can do normal delivery and asked Dr Ritu to take me to the OT. Thank you for your excellent treatment and also grateful for your friendly staff members.You have no idea how much of a blessing you are to us. Thanks for being such an amazing doc.

review: How sweet it is to walk down my memory lane..I visited Dr. Ritu's clinic in the third week of Dec for pregnancy checkup. I experienced a warm and cordial journey that endured the entire span of 10 months of my first pregnancy. I'm not only satisfied with her treatment but also the way she treated my pregnancy. she is so polite and calm that I had no problem in asking any questions that would peep in my mind. she is very soft spoken and always ready to listen every minute details. consequently a patient can easily feel at home with her. Dr Rituparna treats her patient so tenderly as if they r her sisters. as a doctor she never allows her patients to miss any important test. her sound knowledge seems to be clearly visible through her explanation. I wished for a normal delivery but I cud hardly imagine that she wud spend the whole night at hospital to make sure that to happen in reality. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Writing this review as a very satisfied patient, parent, and student (if we may say so). Both of us fall into the 30  age bracket. Our quick feedback of Dr. Rituparna Bera - Sarkar based on the interactions in the past 8 months as below, 1. A very confident professional - We are under Dr. Ritu's consultation from the first post-pregnancy appointment to the delivery of the baby. During this period there were multiple confusing times being first-timers in our mind, but not a single time we thought of taking the second opinion. 2. Transparency - She explains complex technical (medical) things in a simplified way with transparency. At the end of the day, you have a clear answer to the current situation and possible scenarios as well. 3. Dedicated time - Her ability and patience to answer any stupidest query are really appreciable. One will not leave the clinic until you are technically/ logically satisfied.  Not sure how she manages to maintain a smile on the face. 4. One-stop solution - The clinic has a scanning facility and it is also linked to diagnostic centers. One can avoid additional stress. 5. Normal delivery - Her constant effort and approach for normal delivery are very appreciable. 6. Network - Doctor is linked to reputed hospital chains like Ovum and Motherhood which gives additional benefit. 7. Availability - Doctor is available on the phone, WhatsApp and accommodative for a walk-in appointment as well. Last but not least, affordable fees & convenient location. Thanks, (Aditi and Shantanu)
reply_text: Thanks Aditi and Shantanu. All the best.

review:
st of all, I would like to thank Dr. Rituparna mam from bottom of my heart for guiding me through out my pregnancy journey and delivering healthy baby.

My pregnancy journey started nearly a year back. Due to age factor, I was initially worried about going ahead with my 2nd pregnancy. A complete understanding was required before proceeding towards next step. I searched for one of the finest doc who can help me and my husband regarding the same. Thanks to practo for helping me on finding Dr Ritu. As mentioned by many many patients, she is extremely calm and caring doc I have ever met in my life. Yes, because of her only , we decided to go for 2nd pregnancy. Her simple but detail explanation is admirable. Sometime she goes very deep to boost up your confidence. I have no doubt on saying, I met one of the best person in my life. Her confidence and positive attitude is something which brings enormous positivity in life. 
She preferred minimum medicine and scan. Since I already have one baby, I can correlate and make out the difference. Doctor, from the beginning told me clearly what to do and what not. Specifically in each trimester her advise on food intake was way too good. Even though the distance from my house to her clinic is significantly high still we never felt tried. One the contrary every time I visited her wonderful clinic i became so relaxed. 
Finally after passing 38 weeks of wonderful moments, delivery date came. Believe me, I had no fear because of her only. Similarly my mom and my husband had extremely high conference on her. She did my x-section with utter most care and gave me another best gift of my life.  
After delivery she visited me every day and the caring still continues üòä. You are truely an amazing doc. Thank you is small word for you. There are many many things which are difficult to write, which you can only feel. So ladies and would be mother just visit her once and enjoy the beautiful journey. No matter what, you will always be there in my heart. I am going to miss my visits mam. Will cherish the memories rest of my life. I definitely recommend her to each and every pregnant ladies. 
At the end, I would like to thank sister maya, vanaja for your help whenever I asked for. God bless you mam and your lovely team. Keep smiling and continuing wonderful job for society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
Initially when we get to know that it's the time to look for a gynaecologist, we went through a lot of profiles and finally referred to Dr Ritu mam by one of my friend.

We are glad that we met Dr Ritu mam. She truly deserves all appreciation and accolades. She is very experienced, professional, calm and friendly in nature. I am really thankful for the way she handled my wife's pregnancy as there were few challanges. However she always gave her positive consultation and made her feel happy and stronger.  She is one with positive attitude towards everything and makes her patients feel comfortable. It doesn‚Äôt matter to her if it‚Äôs a day or night she will always be there whenever her patients need her (each time she come to hospital she will make sure to visit her patients and check the health status). I asked her "when do you sleep mam, most of the time you would you be at hospital or clinic and her answer stunned me". She never asked us for any unnecessary tests and the consultation fee is very minimal. The clinic is well maintained with the best equipment's. She would explain inch by inch about the baby development and show us the movements using ultrasound machine. We don't have to walk out to get any medicine, everything is provided within the clinic. very time you visit and you don't need to run here and there for test and medicines. She found nuchal cord rapped around baby neck, she asked my wife to track the baby movements in a particular time and also shared her emergency contact details. Nuchal cord got off from neck after few weeks by himself. She was tracking down baby growth in every visit and flagged for any abnormalities. She tried  her best to make the normal delivery but due to few challanges at last we had agreed to go for section. Finally we are blessed with baby boy last week and both mother and child are super healthy now.

Thank you so much for all the luv and care mam. We really miss your consultation sessions.

You deserve more awards and respect.

Highly recommended!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review: In the  middle of our pregnancy journey, we visited Dr. Rituparna and we consider this to be our one of the finest decisions we have made. Dr. Rituparna was warming from day 1 and soon she became our Ritudi ( an elder sister what we call in Bengali) without we became aware of it. She guided us over the process with her valuable suggestions regular scans, timely medicines and relevant injections. Her clinic is well equipped with modern USG instrument (which she operates herself), NST test and medicines and injection. All of these are of utmost importance as the time progresses and may not be always feasible for the patients to do the scans externally. She took care of every single bit of her patient's requirements. She has  an extremely pleasent personallity, which cares the patient and family. She is attached with several well reputed maternity hospitals where the delivery could be done on the choice of the patient. Unlike many doctors, she always insisted on going for a normal delivery if everything is fine. We felt we are in the safe hands from day 1 and that motivates us to regularly travel for more than 15 km one way to visit her. She entertained us over phone and WhatsApp at any given point of time. She got an extremely pleasant personality and calm nature., she used to listen every problem patiently and give relevant suggestion for every problem. She Insisted my wife to send the daily fetal movement counts every day from 30th week.  She has been supportive during the operation( in the OT room) and even sang to console my wife, to overcome the pain and fear during that time. This implies how much confident she is in her area of expertise. Finally, we have been blessed with a baby boy under her guidance. Overall, Ritudi is a complete package that any expecting parents would look for and we sincerely wish her many more successes in the upcoming time.  She has been a blessing to us and many others. Thank you Ritudi!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
I remember visiting Dr.Ritu for common cold in her small clinic near Ram medicals in 2019.From that omwards, I started visiting her for any medical issues.I had PCOD problem and some issues in getting pregnant.She was the one who gave simple solutions and medications.she is very friendly,easily approachable and with full positive energy whenever we visited.On December 23,2020 we started with treatment of pcod to get pregnant.She gave few tablets to continue and told to take pregnancy test on 34th day else to continue the tablets in the same pattern for 3 months before going for costly tests or scan.By God's grace , i got the 2 pink lines on january 19,2021.During my first date scan she told my cervical length is bit low so I may require cerclage after 3 months but she gave hopes that it will be ok.During my 2nd month also it was low but in NT scan it became normal and she told that cerclage is not needed.She never told us to take any unnecessary scans or test.Unfortunately due to family circumstances , I had to move to chennai after my first trimester.I visited Dr.Ritu and had a complete checkup and she showed green signal for travel.From the day i reached Chennai my husband and I were checking s√®veral doctors but noone was satisfying..changed 2 doctors in the next two trimesters.None was like Ritu., there was not a single day without stress because of the scary feel the doctors gave because I had polyhydroamnios.we literally MISSED Dr.Ritu for her kind positive words that is more needed for a pregnant woman than any medications.Atlast i delivered my baby girl on sep 11,2021 via c-section.

I would recommend Dr.Ritu 200% for her positivity and I still thank her for the help she did in my life.
reply_text: Thank you Husnu.. Enjoy the parenthood..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Ritu Review
 
We want to rate many stars to Ritu madam but it is limited to only 5. So 5/5 for the Superstar. Pls include more stars.

Married for more than 9 years and looking for a baby. Treated from big hospitals in chennai with no use. They almost decided to adopt.

They decided to go for a final try before adopting. Checked in Practo and got to know about Ritu madam. The next 3 months i was pregnant. Below are the reasons why we 200% suggest Ritu madam.

- The way she talks gives you a great confidence. You will feel, yes I am going to have a baby. This is half the treatment. 

- Regarding treatment, literally no treatment to me. She just treated for what s required. ** ******** ********* *** ************** She spend around 30 mins for each patient which I don't think other doctors do.

- Very less C-Sections. Ritu madam = Normal delivery. 

- Only 2 or 3 scans in whole 10 months. ** ******** ***** *** ********* No panicking the patient. She will tell what is required to be told. 

- Very important, you can take your whole family with you for checkups. Every body are welcomed. 

- Very nominal fees.

- She owns the patient. More of a family like relationship.


There are too many points to be included but nothing can fully explain the experience we had with her. As the journey is completed, we are going to miss Ritu madam. 

Not exaggerating, *** ** **** *** ** *** I never thought i could will have a cute cute baby girl. 

Now my return gratitude to her is be her PRO. I am going to call all my friend and relatives who are looking for baby and send them to her. 

Finally, Ritu madam said she s a small doctor. 

Madam you are a Brand by yourself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello people, i hope you guys are safe and sound.

Writing on behalf of my wife (Siva Ranjani) - we've been consulted by a couple of other OB/GYN(s) and unfortunately resulted in a couple of miscarriages before we met Dr. Rituparna (Angel in disguise). Ever since our first consultation with Dr. Rituparna, we've started to sense a lot of positivity and absolutely success vibes. Dr. Ritu has been (we're sure she'll continue to) completely patient in listening to my wife's life style and questions, then, Dr. Ritu clarified each and every question comprehensively. Most importantly, Dr. Ritu always explains things with a quick diagram on the white sheet for us to easily connect to what we've been discussing. Doctor never had prescribed too many medications or further unnecessary/irrelevant treatments (or) lab tests. Doctor had always advised the most convenient mitigations for every hurdle that might slow down the process. The way Dr. Ritu explains the reason behind the scans and visits to the clinic is absolutely sensible and satisfying. Despite the medical industry being unreal lately, this doctor had never uttered a word in regard to marketing or promoting. I recommend the most genuine Dr. Rituparna anyday. The journey has been a sheer joy. My wife delivered a baby (guys, please send in your blessings) on 19 December, 2021. We've always knew we are in the safe hands which eventually turned out be true (hence proven). Thanks a million to Dr. Rituparna from us and our family. God bless you for the service you offer to the couples who reach out to you with a lot of hopes and anticipation.
