review: I ,along with my wife,visited Dr Ritu's Clinic for a pre-pregnancy check-up during the final quarter of the last year.  After hearing us patiently and answering all our queries, we were assured that  we've ultimately reached the right Dr. We were so impressed with the behaviour as well as her patience of hearing we couldn't think of visiting another doctor for a second opinion. Within two months under the the doctor's advice my wife got pregnant. Since then whenever we visited the clinic, we were enthralled with the patience, efficacy & the depth of experience of Dr Rituparna. It was really a beautiful & most satisfactory experience of my life. Every time we visited the Dr no matter how trivial the cause is, the doctor guided us with utmost sincerity & dedication. We couldn't belive the care she took even in time of doing the scans in her clinic. I admitted my wife to the hospital three days in advance but the Dr. never missed to attend my wife in her bed & to encourage for a normal delivery, though we were really sceptical about it , amidst her busy schedule. On the final day of delivery we were amazed to see her coolness, care & efficacy in the labour room.  Finally we were delighted to have a healthy normal baby, though my wife had a lot of complications at the initial stages of pregnancy. We 're really thankful to the doctor for such a nice , perhaps the most beautiful journey of our lives. God bless Dr. Rituparna for serving the patients like us with so much care & patience. We're really great full to you, Dr. Rituparna and wish the very name " Dr. Rituparna" Is going to be a ' household' name in the coming days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Maternal Care/ Checkup,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
I met with Dr Ritu when me and my husband were trying to concieve.. we met with her for pre pregnancy counselling and got some amazing advice on the do‚Äôs and dont‚Äôs.. i got a positive test in February and had been consulting with her since then..
My pregnancy journey was not a smooth one and I had several complications which included - retroplacental bleeding leading to early contractions and admission to hospital at 20 weeks.. due to the bleeding there was also a risk of baby being SGA/IUGR

I had to be admitted several times to the hospital during the 9 months due to early labor contractions which were getting triggered by the placenta bleeding.. Dr Ritu was there with us through each and every hard moment.. guiding us.. helping us understand what the complications are.. what can be done and most importantly made us stay positive throughtout the entire time.

My due date was 29/10 but since the baby had been measurung small and also my cervix was tightly closed.. she decided to go ahead with induction on my weekly checkup on 20/10. I got admitted that day itself and induction procesw started. After the second dose of medicine, my contractions started getting extremely painful and my water broke.. Dr Ritu‚Äôs priority was baby‚Äôs well being as it was measuring small and small babies do not tolerate labor well.. 

After almost 14 hours of painful contractions .. my baby heartbeat started dipping a lot and we had to go for a c-section and my baby was safely out in 10 minutes :)

Dr Ritu is an amazing doctor who not only listens and addresses each concern but also gives ample time at each appointment. She was in touch with me just like a family member constantly checking on me, my pain, and well being throughout the entire 9 months. Without her guidance and direction, i would have never been able to have a positive mindset throughout my pregnancy.

context: Adenomyosis Treatment,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Initially i had visited Dr. Rituparna for menstrual issues and abdomen pain.
Liked her friendly behaviour and the way she understand the problems and explains very patiently and politely each and everything.
Later for the pregnancy we didnt had a better option than her as i was very comfortable with Dr. Rituparna.
Trust me it was worth taking that decision. I had breathing issues which made me less confident for a normal delivery.
But each time when visited doctor for regular checkups, her words was giving me more confidence. More than me she was more
determined that she will try making it a normal delivery. Their was a chord around my baby, also baby head was little far from
the pelvic area which was definitly a matter to be worried. But she was confident enough whatever it is i will be going for 
a normal delivery. October 17th was the due date for my delivery. When visited doctor on Oct 11th for regular checkup.
Doctor told their are chances baby has passed motion so i need to get admitted in the hospital the very next day.
If baby had passed motion than chances of normal delivery will be less. But the challenge was babys head was still far.
I was not getting my normal pain so got the pain induced. Even after the first dose baby head was still far. We where worried.
But doctor gave us the confidence that it will be a normal delivery itself. Later second dose also was given.
Entire night i had to go throught the pain as baby head was far, doctor was their for us monitoring the improvements and
giving us the confidence. Finally on Oct 13th morning i had given birth for my baby. As promised by doctor it was a normal 
delivery. Also my baby was healthy without any issues. Im so glad for taking the right decision of choosing Dr Rituparna as my doctor. 
Thank you doctor for being with me for the entire journey of my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Rituparna is an Amazing doctor who is always there to help you and listen to your problems before, during and after the delivery.
We consulted Dr. Rituparna first time on 22nd September 2020. We were planning for a baby and needed some counselling on that as my wife was having chronic UTI. We were worried that it can effect the pregnancy and cause complications. 
But when we met Dr. Rituparna, she listened to our problem very patiently and She advised little life style modification and very few medicine. We were very happy to meet a doctor like her who is so friendly and gives enough time for the consultation.
Withing no time, the UTI problem was treated. 
My wife conceived in the month of December and since then it has been a beautiful journey. 
Initially, during the 1st scan, we got to know that my wife is having short cervical length which may cause complications like late miscarriage or premature delivery. We were very scared but Dr. Rituparna told us not to worry and She is there to take care of this. As per guidance of Dr. Ritu the condition improved and my wife completed her full pregnancy term. It gave us enough confidence. Dr. Rituparna was always there to consult and guide us throughout this journey of pregnancy.
Dr. Rituparna's stepwise approach during this period is one of the best experience we had with her during these 9 months . She doesn't suggest any unnecessary tests and medications which many corporate hospitals do now a days.
My wife delivered a Baby girl on 10th September 2021 and both Mother and Baby are healthy and it was possible just because of Dr Rituparna who was constantly guiding us through this 9 month time. It's Dr. Rituparna's constant guidance and motivation which helped my wife to deliver the baby normally without LACS. Although at one point during her labour, my wife almost gave up and she decided to go with LACS but Dr. Rituparna never gave up on her and made her believe that she can do it. She stood by her and motivated her to keep trying as it's a matter of just few moments. 
We are so grateful to Dr. Rituparna for helping us to deliver our bundle of joy. Thank you so much Dr. Ritu.

review: The compassion of the Doctor that matters most.. In the very early stage of my pregnancy, I humbly opted for one of the most coveted hospital, but I was disappointed by the expenditure..I took the decision of changing Doctor. review:
During our initially days of pregnancy we had visited one of the reputed fetal  medical Center for doing NT scan where we were informed that the NT value of the baby was at a higher side than normal. Our gynaecologist had advised for going ahead with invasive prenatal testing and informed us that it my be a risk to the fetus. Since this was our first baby we were very worried about the NT scan though we understand it was not a confirmatory test. The gynaecologist with whom we were then taking advice was rude and forcing us to go ahead with risky procedure.
But it was our luck at tat time that we found Dr Rituparna mam, who studied all our reports and firstly made us comfortable and helped us in taking NIPT test. She was there with us like a family member in understanding our fear and mindset and guided  throughout our pregnancy time. Even when I was diagnosed with short cervix during my anamoly test , Ritu man took utmost care in performing cervical cerclage on the same night and ensured that I was fine and monitored till I got discharged safely. During this pandemic situation when the whole country was on lockdown, Ritu mam  had ensured we  did not miss any of our medications and routine scan at the right time.  After lots of complications, just because Ritu mam was on our side we were able to deliver our baby boy on 17th Oct. we are really thankfull to her for guiding us like a family member. ** ********* *** ** *** ** *** **** ************* you may go to if you need a safe n secure pregnancy time  as she is available anytime for her patientsüòä

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Prenatal Checkup,Pregnancy Scan,
review: My journey with Dr. Ritu started in January 2020 when i got to know that i am pregnant and then i never thought of consulting any other Doctor. She has been very humble and patient with me since my first visit. She explains everything in detail. The best thing about her is - she doesn't hide anything from you. If something is wrong then she will clearly convey the same. She wont give false hopes. We used to ask her so many questions (both relevant and irrelevant), but she would never get impatient and use to answer everything clearly. Doesn't matter how hectic her day was, she will still treat you as if you are her first patient for the day. She is never in hurry. She is always available on calls and whatsapp. She use to proactively check on my health when my due date was nearing. I never had any challenges in my First and second trimester but my third trimester was a little difficult where i started gaining unhealthy weight. All the tests were done on time and i had no BP or sugar issues. My baby's growth was also fine. After 38 weeks, my swelling got worse. Doctor decided to pre-pone the delivery so that both my baby and i are in good health. She tried for normal delivery and i was induced twice. But my labor didnt start. Hence, doctor decided to go for c-section without wasting anytime. I delivered my baby within 50 minutes. Both my baby and i are in good health. she visited us many times during our stay in the hospital. And she was also very nice to my family members. I am very thankful to Dr. Rituparna for supporting me throughout my pregnancy. I am also consulting her for my post pregnancy follow ups. I am sure my post pregnancy visits will also go well with her. She is compassionate and caring towards her patients. Would highly recommend her

review:
I am writing this review based on my experience  and with a sense of gratitude and Thanksgiving to Dr.Ritu. 
We came across reviews in Practo and went for our first check-up after testing positive with the Pregnancy kit, till today, our experience has been nothing short of fantastic. During my pregnancy, consultation with Dr.Ritu was the best thing that happened to us.
The greatest positive is the Dr.Ritu's ability to listen patiently to the patients about  doubts(silly may be) and explaining the complexities in a very lucid manner.
My pregnancy was filled with multiple surprises that I had to go on urgent cervical stitch to early delivery, Dr.Ritu's guidance was the one which made our maternity successful with normal delivery. There are not enough words to thank her, and we are indebted to her, though it's just her job,but the personal care and attention is something which you don't find with all doctors anywhere. 
Also if there is any doubt or emergency at any time, she is always approachable through phone and WhatsApp, that she would respond in minutes despite her busy schedule.
Our checkup and consultation during every week or fortnight has been more of a training season mentally as well that a senior or friend explaining things without much fuss,  we also get  mentally prepared for the pregnancy and other things to come. We are totally happy and satisfied to be under care and guidance and we thank you for everything. Never in my dreams, I thought I would have a normal delivery, since I was mostly under rest and did not much of physical workouts, but Dr.Ritu made it possible. 

At times she would call me herself and enquire about health and wellbeing and suggest how to move forward.

I am looking for a paediatrician like her, who is really good at her work and caring/approachable to her patients.

review:
We visited Dr.Ritu when I found out that I was pregnant. We got a recommendation from Practo. It was a great decision for us as she was extremely accesible on phone and WhatsApp. No matter how silly my queries were,  she always promptly responded. 

In times of lockdown she kept checking on me via phone and also asked if wanted to visit personally as she opened the clinic once a week.

All my visits in her clinic were nothing short of being delightful. She patiently answered all our queries and ensured that we are timely updated with any practical risks for the baby. She always made sure that we understand any situation and pregnancy related concerns by explaining in a layman language. We used to look forward to the visits. 

My baby was in breech position at 36 weeks when she recommended us to be prepared to deliver through c section. I was also clearly instructed to rush to the hospital in case my labour starts or water breaks. I followed the instructions exactly when my water broke at 4 AM at 37 week. I called her and kept talking to her throughout, while duty doctor examined me in the hospital. 

As per the examination I did not need an emergency C section so we waited for Dr. Ritu at 7 AM to proceed to the OT.
My baby girl was born at 7:40 AM through the procedure lead by Dr. Ritu. I was very calm as Dr. Ritu was with me throughout the procedure, explaining me what was happening.  She also visited me everyday during my stay at the hospital to ensure that I am well prepared to take care of myself and the baby.

My entire pregnancy was an amazing and memorable journey all thanks to Dr. Ritu.She was compassionate, patient and genuinely caring in all her interactions. We will miss visiting her regularly but she is our obvious choice for an gynaecology visits.

I would highly recommend her.

review: We approached Dr rituparna mam based on online reviews and we made a very right decision by choosing her as our gynecologist.. After our first consulation with Dr. Rituparna mam, Me and my husband decided that we will continue with the same Doctor throughout this pregnancy journey as we felt very comfortable talking to her and most importantly her detaied explanation and assurance to me being pregnant for the first time... Unfortunately I lost my baby in the 7th week of pregnancy due to lack of heartbeat... At that time, Ritu mam gave moral support to overcome that situation... Again I could be able to become pregnant after 7 months in September 2022 naturally with all her instructions and advices.. When my pregnancy began, everything was normal and had no complications. But when I reached 20 weeks, I was diagnosed with short cervix in Nt scan... That day itself Ritu mam advised me to undergo cervical cerclage...I was really scared about the surgery but doctor gave moral support and  said not to worry about the surgery, everything will be alright soon And she performed a small surgery that night itself successfully.. She helped me in each and every phase of this pregnancy journey..There were many ups and downs in my pregnancy but in every stage, she hand held us, gave us the boost that we needed and helped us to bring my little bundle of joy to this world. It is only because of her words and motivation I went thorough this pregnancy journey... With all her instructions and advices, it all went well. We came to 9th month of pregnancy. Our visits frequency stated increasing as the date was closer.On 25th of May, When I went to labour room, I was really very scared and asked my husband and other doctor to go for c section again and again... I was literally screaming and scolding everyone for not agreeing for C section... But seeing Ritu mam walk into the labour room gave me the confidence that i can do it... tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We approach Dr rituparna based on online reviews and clinic being near to our place and we made a very right decision choosing her as our gyno.our experience with dr for the past 9months and post delivery has been wonderful. Me and my husband we both stay alone n we both are working. This was our first pregnancy and there is no elder to guide us...so naturally we were dependent on the Dr and Google off course....and we had lot of doubts, silly questions. Now here is our feedback....

1. Dr Ritu always listens to your doubts and queries and answers all your silly questions patiently. She explains complicated medical terms in a very simplified way. She is never in a hurry and gives each and every patient dedicated time.

2. You can discuss your financial condition with her. She understands your situation and gives you a solution. 

3. She has a scanning facility and you can do the test at her clinic. The prices are reasonable. She doesn't prescribe lot of medicine.

4. She is constantly available for you. She also replies you on watsapp in case of emergency.

5.she is very punctual so never be late for your visits

Now here is walkthrough of my delivery experience.

My delivery was schedule on 3rd of July. And my first option was normal delivery...we choose ovum hospital hrbr layout.  so Dr had advised me to start counting baby movements..however on 22nd of June my movements were very less. Usually it should be 5 kicks in an average after every meal within 1hr. But that day it was only 2 after lunch. I messaged Dr and she immediately replied that I can wait and see till dinner. I had dinner at 11pm and waited for 1hr. There was only 1kick now. I informed Dr and she immediately told me to do a NST test. We ran to ovum. By the time the test was complete and we reach home at 2:30 AM. Amazingly Dr was awake so long for me. Next day we visited the clinic and Dr suggested we should get admitted as the movements have become less. I followed her instructions and artificial pain was induced.. since I was trying for normal delivery it was important that normal labour pain should come. But in my case till next day morning the labour pain did not come. I was told that Dr Ritu will come within 2-3hrs and then we can take a call. By the time it was 5:30am 24th June. While I was in pain and was only wishing to see Dr Ritu asap, she was right there in front of me. I was so happy to see her and it was such a relief. My movements were 0 and I wanted to go ahead with c section. Dr Ritu is so well  connected even though nurses were not available but because of Dr Ritu network nurses were there within 5mins and I was immediately taken to the OT. 

Thanks to Dr ritu's smooth process I delivered a baby girl and her name is DIA. 

One quick tip to the all the husbands: while I was in the OT my husband fell off to sleep only thinking that Dr Ritu is there with me. So would be fathers don't panic and enjoy the  moment.

P:S after the delivery I missed my family , in laws who could not come due to covid. And when there was 100 of phone calls, everybody going about the news I was really missing my mom and right then a beautiful thing happen,Dr Ritu came for a visit....and she told me I want to know how my little angel doing (and she meant me)..


Thank you Doctor üòä
reply_text: Thanks Sangeeta for such a nice and kind feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had a wonderful experience with Dr Ritu for my pregnancy. Right from the first visit, Dr Ritu came across as a very calm, reassuring and understanding doctor. She explains each phase of pregnancy and also the tests and scans to be done. She gives enough time to every patient and does not rush through the appointment. 

Even when we got some results (double marker) that were not favorable, she explained both the positive and negative outcomes clearly. She encouraged us to stay positive. We waited for the NIPT results and thankfully the results were normal.

One big advantage is that Dr Ritu has her own ultrasound device at her clinic and she observes the baby, and we can hear the heartbeat at every consultation. She also performs some of the scans at her clinic. A few scans are referred to other centres.

One of the main reasons we decided to go with Dr Ritu was that she encourages normal deliveries without any medication during labour. That is exactly how my birthing experience was too. I had a very positive birthing experience and felt really calm once Dr Ritu was in the labour room. She was really organised and meticulous. I knew both me and my baby were in good hands. 

We will forever be grateful to Dr Ritu for such a positive pregnancy and birthing of our second child, our daughter. I highly recommend Dr Ritu to everyone pregnant for a beautiful pregnancy and birthing experience.

tags: Wait time,
review: The whole experience was magical. It all started 2022 September where we lost our hope and made up our mind that we never going to be parents. And there comes my friend who suggested to meet DR. Rituparna because they were going through the same pain and later brought a beautiful  life to the world. He said "It was all possible because of Dr. Rituparna". I still didn't believe that. Being said that we met Rituparna for the 1st time and we were asked to take some medications because I was at my peak with PCOD infact I kinda met atleast 7 - 8 doctors already but I couldn't get anywhere close to a solution. It kinda bacame very worse and that's when we met Dr. Rituparna. I still did not take it seriously and i just continued the medication only for 3-4 weeks and I stopped it. I still had PCOD issue after 5 months we decided to meet DR. Rituparna to check on PCOD status.! But that's when Dr. Rituparna made me realise that I was pregnant for 5 months, made me realise that I'm a mother already, made me realise that even I can be a mother, made me realise that I was wrong about her. It's been 4 years and I taught it's never going to possible, but Dr. Rituparna made it possible in just 4 weeks..! She is definitely a miracle and turns out to be a very important and precious person in our life.! Thank you for life..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First we went to one renowned  gyno doctor before visiting dr Ritu  for my pregnency and she suggested us to perform NIPT (HIGHLY COSTLY  TEST to find chromosomal abnormalities).I was completely lost because of her words and  the way she explained the issue .Then we thought of taking second openion and we found doctor Ritu  and the first day way she explained it was recommendable and  at the same time she explained NIPT was not required ,it was better to run the NT scan after a week ,any way NIPT result was absolutely normal but way she helped out to get rid of  our anxiety was unexplainable.
Next few months were pretty much smooth till 7 th month where I found my baby is absolutely fine but my platelet count was very less 
Around 60 k where normal is 1.5lacs and then she suggested us to have kiwi fruit which eventually helped me to increase my P.Count and during last month another time it dropped  to 48 K .....I was bit worried  again then she explained us why it is happening and this is something which she can easily take care .
On Sep 1st ,2023 with dr ritus  guidance and god's grace I was blessed with a baby girl.
Thanks Dr Ritu for not only as doctor but also being a mentor  and a friend and importantly as a human being  which is missing now a days .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Happy Mom here, who was blessed with 2nd Baby boy by Jul-22-2023.

Our 2nd Pregnancy journey started somewhere by Dec'2021 and after thorough online reviews, we consulted Ritupurna Mam. In the initial visit itself we were very happy with the Doctor's knowledge & friendliness. Post initial screening, she confirmed that we can try for a 2nd baby. We thought it would be easy like 1st one(5 yrs prior) but we faced quite few obstacles like hit by Covid 3rd wave, unplanned travel & stressful life. However Doctor remained positive & gave us a lot of confidence. She corrected or suggested new approach based on each tests results. Got conceived by Aug'2022 but it was short lived due to baby been conjoint twins & no heart beat post 6 weeks. We had to abort it & it was a very tough phase. Again Doctor's experience,  positive mindset helped us a lot and finally conceived again by Oct'2022 & each tests were scary for us but fortunately all the results came positive. Doctor guided us well with diet plan, exercise routine & life style changes. As I started with, by Jul'2023 we were blessed with Baby boy & much credit goes to Dr. Ritupurna Mam. 

We would be always grateful for her support and highly recommend her even without a second thought. 

Keep up the good service you do to this society Mam and wish you a Happy & Healthy long life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Rituparna - the true definition of a doctor.
My wife and I visited Dr Rituparna when we were trying to conceive.
It makes me so happy to write about Dr Ritu, she truly is the best. She gives each of her patient ample amount of time even though there are so many in waiting always. She explains what we should do and why. She lets you know her plan of action for the next visit.
She examined my wife thoroughly and suggested a few steps to follow, put her on a few medicines while also testing all possibilities just in case we need any special attention. On one such test we got to know that my wife had a cyst and had to be removed laparoscopically.
Dr Ritu was so confident and calm about this procedure and assured us that removing this cyst would give us a great chance at pregnancy and performed this procedure with grace and she was right. My wife was pregnant within 2 months after this procedure. Dr Ritu was there with us throughout our pregnancy journey. She made sure that my wife was on healthy pregnant track. She delivered our little bundle of joy with utmost care. 

We are very grateful for having Dr Ritu in our corner throughout. She must be celebrated for her simplicity, calmness, confidence, expertise and patience. Thank you, Doctor!

I was referred to Dr. Ritu during 4th month of my pregnancy. Since then till my delivery, Ritu ma‚Äôam ensured that I have a smooth pregnancy journey with her proper guidance. She made sure that I have a normal delivery for which she suggested me various yoga asanas. Not only with the baby position for normal delivery, she also made sure that baby has proper growth parameters by suggesting proper nutrition and diet. She is very humble in her approach and would provide correct solutions at any point whenever there is a doubt. Her staff members at her clinic are also friendly and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started seeing dr. Ritu a year before , i was suffering from pcos and was not able to concieve. Dr .ritu explained to me about pcos and asked me to change my lifestyle. She did not prescribe me unnecessary tests, scans or medicines , she just gave me few supplements and suggested a thyroid pill to concieve. I made the changes and took medicine for 3 months and i concieved naturally . During pregnancy i wasnt in india and wanted to get delivered  only by her cz i could not trust any other doctor apart from her . In my 8th month of pregnancy when i was back to india , my bp started fluctuating . Dr ritu suggested for early delivery as the bp was not controllable . I delivered normally in my 36th week by her inspite of having grade 1 preeclampsia . She prepared me beforehand for both normal and csec delivery but tried her best for normal . I was induced and delivered a baby boy. I would recommend dr ritu to every woman whose trying to concieve and to pregnant women as shes the most calm , friendliest, dedicated and honest doctor i have come across. She listens to patient's concern and is very patient with every individual.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This is my first pregnancy and Dr. Rituparna is my first and last doctor throughout the journey. Happy to inform that i undergo with normal delivery process which is very rare in Bangalore now. She has prescribed only minimal medicines and very less tests. She recommended only required medicine and compulsory tests. In other place generally we see lots of unnecessary medicines and tests recommended by doctors.
The services that I receive from Dr. Rituparna is just fantastic. Dr. Rituparna and her clinic staffs are friendly and ensure that I am properly informed about my health and care along with setting appointments with doctor in time. I would love to recommend them to friends and family.
Dr. Rituparna is incredible. Not only she has taken great care of my health, but also she is very polite to speak during every meeting. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient! 
Also, we had a great opportunity to select the best hospital for delivery as DR. Rituparna has connections with many good hospitals like Altius, Ovum, motherhood etc... We took admission in Altius hospital and Dr. Rituparna was always available there whenever ever we need her .

review:
I landed in knowing about her through google reviews, My journey with Ritu mam started for PCOS management, then got naturally conceived through her proper guidance.
She doesn't load you with medicines, but pics the appropriate ones. I had pregestational diabetes and gestational hypertension, and weighing around 106kgs at the time of delivery. Her positive attitude, advice and the way she monitored me everyday like asking me to update her my 3 blood pressure readings everyday in whatsapp and she also replies to that. Regular investigations... just the required ones, were suggesed timely. I didn't have many doubts or questions to her, because I always believed in her decisions for me, she gains that through her polite and clear way of explanation.
Last week I delivered a healthy baby boy with enormous effort from the labour team to make it vaginal delivery but landed in c section due to unavoidable situation which was clearly explained to my family by Ritu mam without panicking them.
The foremost important thing in pregnancy is, in whose hands you are in.  I got the BEST!!!!!! forever thankful to herüòäüôè

review: I visited Dr Ritu Perna for pre pregnancy counselling, after the first visit we were sure we made the right choice of going to her. Later I was diagnosed with PCOD, she explained the treatment details, diet and exercise, within 3 months of treatment I was able to conceive naturally.   We then visited her throughout the pregnancy, she prescribed us with minimal medication and lots of positivity. She makes us feel so comfortable with her kind and generous nature, she is very genuine and asks us to do just what is required, nothing extra or fancy. For any issues, she suggested easy remedies * **** ****** ******** My pregnancy journey was super smooth because of her, we never had a second thought as we always felt that my baby and I were in the safest hands. context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,
review:
We met Dr. Rituparna in November 2021 after reading about her great reviews. My wife was having PCOS and irregular periods. Doctor tried a unique solution where she tried to control my wife's PCOS as well as help us in conceiving at the same time. This solution worked for us and we were able to conceive in a few months. When my wife was pregnant, she ran into multiple complications and it was a high risk pregnancy. However, the doctor had a solution for everything, monitored the entire pregnancy very closely and guided us very well in our journey. Towards the end she took the right call on when to initiate the delivery, which ensured safety of both the baby and the mother. My wife had a low Fetal movement and the Doctor did an emergency C-Section at midnight. Doctor has an innovative approach to treatments and has a very calm, composed and positive personality which keeps us relaxed. She is very approachable and kind to her patients, takes good time to explain everything before starting anything. We are indebted to the Doctor for our precious baby girl. We would highly recommend Dr. Rituparna for all your pre and post pregnancy needs.

Thank you very much Doctor!!

Regards,
Sneha & Matt

As the days/months passed, the Doctor decided to operate at the right time. Finally, on 15th August, my wife delivered a healthy baby Girl. Both mother and baby are now fit and fine. We are very thankful to Dr. Ritu Mam. I strongly suggest the Doctor to anyone looking forward to a Gynecologist. She always stands by her patients, not only as a doctor but as a friend. 

She maintained transparency and educated us about every course of treatment. Her patience and dedication towards her patients and profession are commendable. Dr. Ritu Parna Mam is a great doctor in high demand, which translates to waiting time, but it was worth it. We are very thankful to Mam and her team.

review: *** ** *** **** ************ **** ** **** **** ***** Before we saw her, we had been through 2 miscarriages &10 Hospitals in 5 years of trying. The last doctor we went to suggested 30 injections for my wife is she gets pregnant again.  So we came to See Dr Rituparna instead. And when my wife became pregnant, she never suggested any injections. Confidence issues were there for my wife after the 2 miscarriages about holding on to the fetus, but Dr Ritu never treated her like a patient, just a normal pregnant person which was most reassuring for us. We can call ourselves parents because of Dr Rituparna. Simply put, she is our Guardian Angel.

She is the one whom we can blindly trust and follow. She is such a polite, social and friendly doctor. She explains each and every medical situation in terms we could understand. 
By God's grace, we have consulted mam for my second pregnancy. I had got low AFI from seventh month of my pregnancy. Even after all possible medications, my AFI did not improve much but Dr. Ritu mam has handled the situation leading to normal delivery which other doctors wouldn't have. 
When other doctors suggested to deliver my baby early through c-sec, Ritu mam has handled the risky situation and made me deliver my baby at ninth month through normal delivery.

Dear doctor, 

This is my heartfelt thank you note for you. Right from my childhood, I always wanted to become a mother, but I never knew how many changes would happen to a woman‚Äôs body during the pregnancy. But doctor, you made it an amazing journey for me. We came to your clinic for prenatal counselling, the consultation you provided helped us conceive quickly and safely with all the vaccines taken. Everyone I know says, the first trimester is hard but the medicines you provided helped me overcome nausea and morning sickness easily. From then on, every consultation you provided helped me overcome the challenges of pregnancy with much more ease. women like me and I wish our baby girl becomes an inspiring personality as you someday.

review: I found  Dr. Rituparna Bera Sarkar after i googled nearest gynaecologist for my wife... since i am from a different city and have no references i can trust on... i had no choice but to go for online option to choose the clinic. usually people for pregnancy will only prefer doctors who are being referred by friends or cousins. I am thankful that i landed in the correct place .. i got a good feel as soon we entered we were greeted by the receptionist ( Vanaja) , she was courteous , respectful and very caring she understood that this our first visit ever to a gynaecologist for pregnancy she took all our details and set our appointment. So when i met  Dr Ritu she answered us very patiently as we came with the silliest of doubts :).. once Doctor started explaining the entire stages of pregnancy step by step we gained confidence decided that she is the doctor for the pregnancy ..after which we have done many visits so far and nothing is changed we still have the same level of good experience when we walk in to the clinic each time. Dr Rituparna takes at the most care possible and patiently explains each step for us. I Respect her dedication and care which she takes for each patient.

review:
We feel extremely lucky that we got treatment from ritu madam.
Initially we were very scared due to covid situation and were hesitant to come to clinic . after talking to mam on phone we got confidence and started visiting clinic . There are many positives  which we can talk .Most important are below according to me 
1) The way in which madam explains about every thing in detail
2) very friendly 
3) will listen to every problem
4) availability in phone during last trimester
5) post pregnancy's support

it is my second pregnancy's during which i visted ritu madam   . During my first pregnancy's I went to my home town . I had really tough time handling post surgery pain . This time it was very smooth . I was  able to walk on second day morning by my self. It was a big achievement for me considering the fact that i had to take help of my husband ,father and nurse to walk during my first pregnancy's and that to with huge pain .


we are very happy and feel very lucky to get treatment from madam . we really miss visiting clinic . 

thank  madam for all the support through my pregnancy and making it a memorable journey .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Ritu is a blessing in disguise for couples planning for pregnancy or have already conceived. She is extremely humble and polite human being with a heart of gold.
We went by Practo recommendation and visited Dr Ritu for the first time in Feb 2020 and from then there was no looking back. Soon national lockdown was announced and my NT Scan and few crucial tests were to be done but due to lockdown it was very difficult to find a lab, Dr Ritu arranged everything and made sure all my scans and tests are done timely and smoothly. The love and compassion she has towards new parents and baby is just remarkable. 
She made me stick to natural sources of nutrition without giving any unnecessary supplements. Dr Ritu helped me maintain a very active lifestyle, optimum level of body weight and a positive mindset.In the last few weeks she helped me prepare my body for normal delivery. This made my delivery process very smooth, my labor was short, no epidural was required and I delivered normally with Dr Ritu, her team and my husband by my side. 
Thank You for everything Dr Ritu 
I already miss coming to your clinic.

I was under her medication for the entire pregnancy. Dr. Rituparna has a very sound knowledge and tremendous practical experience of c-section. She is so efficient that within  a couple of weeks after my c-section, I felt almost normal. Dr. Sarkar is so well behaved and careful about her patients that a patient can easily open her heart before her without any hesitation. She is very sympathetic and dutiful to her patients. I had a wonderful experience and  sweet memory throughout  the entire journey of my pregnancy under the watchful eyes of Dr. Rtuparna. Out of my heart-felt experience, I strongly  recommend  to visit the doctor's  clinic and see the difference in your own eyes. God bless Dr. Rituparna Bera Sarkar.

review: I have started visiting Doctor from 4th month of   my 2nd pregnancy. Since then I never thought of counsulting any other Doctor. I had a very bad experience after c-section of my 1st delivery in my native . That's why I was very choosy for my 2nd pregnancy. I decided to go ahead with Dr. Ritu only since I always felt I am in safe hands. She always take care of mine as my elder sister. I have never seen her in hurry while checking patients. She stays very very calm and very soft spoken. Apart from her experience, I must salute her surgical skills as well. Whatever she told me to follow , I tried doing my level best and at the end of the day we got good result. My delivery experience with Dr. Ritu was amazing. C-section was completely uncomplicated. Me and my son both were doing extremely good. I have rarely seen Doctor calling patients and asking health, specifically at 3rd trimester. My feelings of those moments can't be explained in words . It's beyond. Good bless you Doctor. Society needs more doctor like you. Even during the time of pandemic I have seen how you are giving your best to all your patients.Thanks for everything doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr. Ritu when I had complications in the first trimester of my pregnancy, having found her referral from Practo and I must say, I was impressed with her from the start. Her professional, yet warm and transparent demeanour made us realise we had found ourselves in good hands. She was knowledgeable, yet patient enough to rest my fears and answered all my queries to my utmost satisfaction. She also had her own scanner which made it easier to get checked except for the anomaly scan, thus helping her to take a call when the situation required without us having to run back and forth to and from the diagnostics and doctor‚Äôs office. Throughout our pregnancy we were faced with different hurdles, like higher than normal blood pressure, less amniotic fluid, less growth and finally less movement if the baby. All these were carefully managed and never once did we feel that things were out of control. When the d-day came, Dr. Ritu handled my labour and delivery very well, with a good head on her shoulders, even staying the night at the hospital as my labour was long. She ensured that I got the right care at the hospital.
I am very happy with Dr. Ritu‚Äôs services and would definitely recommend her to my family and friends. Thank you Dr. Ritu!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Well what to say , in simple she is equal to god for us. We were not with kids even after 6 years of marriage. Went to many doctors, temple s in both Bangalore and Chennai nothing worked. Then finally in Google search found Dr Rituparna and with final try went to her . She was welcoming and explained what might be the delay in pregnancy etc. Based on medications started in February 2020 . And next month unfortunately stuck with lockdown and we had to delay our checkups again . Then went again in may month. All she had given was medications and no unnecessary tests. Finally July 12th we came to know about our little ones pregnant confirmation. To our surprise it was  twins and more than us she was happy . From there on we had frequent checkups and followed all her suggestions and advice . She was always reachable any time of day , I still remember when I had to what's app midnight and got instant replies and suggestions. The expected delivery plan was march 26. But our little ones came out on march 17 th itself. Again my wife had a pain on march 16th at11.30 pm and I called her immediately. She picked up and confirmed it's delivery pain and needs to do c sec . She came to cloud nine hospital immediately and at 2.15 am and finally both my little ones came out safely . I just cannot simply thank her , it should be more than that . I pray for her health and long life to continue helping others like us.

Note : her fees for check ups are very minimal and she herself does follicular scans and NST. She explains all your queries patiently

Also the receptionist vanaja is very helpful *** *** **** ********* ** ***** ***** * ***

Thanks again mam

review: It has been a little more than a year since we have known Dr. Rituparna. The first time me and my husband met her we knew we were in expert hands. We were in the phase where we were trying to conceive, wasn't successful and tried many doctors and the doctors whom we reached out to did not give us that confidence /hope or personal touch which only Dr Ritu could give during our first meet. Her conscientious guidance, detailed explanation for each and every treatment/medicine, caring and showcasing superlative expertise is what I experienced through out!   Her personal touch and willingness to spend time with her patients explaining the situation is a welcome trait and with thyroid and  prediabetic condition  finally conceived with her continual support & treatment.Once i got pregnant then came few challenges each trimester bleeding spots around baby sac,pre-eclampsia, high blood sugar, 2 chords around baby neck etc etc which we were able to sail through since she was letting me know what is/was going on in regular language and not in " typical doctor's language which sometimes sounds like leman language" during our prenatal visit.Thank you doctor Ritu for the wonderful birthing experience, no words are enough to appreciate the service you do.Your talent and caring manner is a credit to the medical profession.Also thanks to her team whom I met during my delivery in ovum and they exceeded all our expectations. You will always have the highest regards for giving us the support and guidance through out our journey. Ever grateful for you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After i came to know that i am expecting i wanted to go for Normal delivery.Some of my friends who became mother then had Normal deliveries under Dr Ritu and suggested me to blindly go under her guidance.My 9 months of pregnancy with Dr Ritu was really very good and satisfactory..I followed her instructions,medications and finally had a smooth normal delivery that took total 5 hours at Cloud nine Hospital @ HRBR layout.The entire medical team under Dr Ritu was just fabulous..Dr Ritu is a very friendly and sweet spoken person.
During each consultancy and check ups she always explained me everything very minutely so that i should be aware of the whole process..She asked me to visit her only when there was a necessity.Moreover after i entered 8th month she asked me to reach her in her mobile number in case of any emergency.She shares her third party WhatsApp no. Where i can book appointment and share my doubts with her assistant. I do not know her name but she is also a very quick responsive ,genuine and helpful person.No attitude, very proactive and friendly.I am thankful to her also..
My baby movement was very less so everyday my task was to send her baby movements count every night before going to bed.She did acknowledge and asked me to go for NST when required.
Post delivery my blood vessels were bleeding a lot and required more time than usual for the stitching.
It was possible only because i was under a fabulous Surgeon Dr Ritu.It took me some weeks to get over the pain and burnings of Vaginal stitches.But the medications given by Dr Ritu really did great wonders...
Thank you so much Dr Ritu Ma'am .If in future i plan for second child,i would like to do again under your guidance..
I am blessed with a healthy baby boy..Enjoying my motherhood...
I wish all expecting women and Mothers a happy life with their child/children..
reply_text: Thanks dear. All the very best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cervical Cerclage,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Preconception Counseling,
review: I have known Dr. Ritu for the last few years. When I came to her clinic for the first time, it was due to UTI problem. The journey begins that day. And I decided , I will come to her only for any problem. Her words worked like magic during that time. I was having minor PCOD issues as well. Doctor suggested medicine is not the only solution, physical fitness plays a key role. And believe me, I got pregnant within 2 months of our planning.  The 10 months journey was awesome.  I never thought I would get such a valuable person in my life during the entire journey every moment. The focus never sifted from requirements. She always always encouraged me for normal delivery. She always shared her motherhood journey experience with me which inspired me all the time for normal delivery. One of the significant things is, no matter how tired she is , she will never let you down. I have hardly seen one person so much dedicated towards her patients. During the covid time , I have seen her seeing patients for hours wearing ppe kit and she still smiles all the time. Her clinic is equipped with a USG scan machine which is the best part of the journey. I never had to run here and there multiple times .  I followed her suggestion, and I delivered the baby boy normally.  I can tell you ladies one thing. If you follow her suggestions word by word the result will be awesome for sure.  At the middle stage , I thought of going back to Chennai, my hometown but just because of Dr. Rituparna I stayed back at Bangalore. She made my life easy.  Not only me, My family members also like her very much and specifically my mother feels doctor is like her daughter only. There are many many sweet memories which will always be there in the core of my heart and will remain there with me. Thank you doctor. Thank you for everything. All the best to all would be mothers. Enjoy the moment , enjoy the journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There are no words to describe how good mam is at her work. She hasn‚Äôt only supported me medically and physically but also mentally and emotionally. She always treated me like a family member rather like a younger sister.
I was about to finish my first trimester when Mam has happened to us. I was not happy with the Dr. I approached initially and decided to change the Dr. The best thing I really like about mam is that she explains each and everything.
During my second trimester, I have been diagnosed with Diabetes that too at its peek of 586. Mam has played a vital role in controlling my sugar levels, I have got admit in the hospital and whole night mam was checking the sugar levels and insulins to treat sugar. After discharge also she kept track on my sugar readings by regular follow ups and we ended up with the controlled sugar levels. She stood there for me 24x7 as she was just a message away for any of my queries and doubts. 
She has than planned my delivery and gave me favourable medications which are best for me and baby so that at the time of delivery there would be no complications and as promised she successfully helped me in delivering my baby with normal procedure of delivery at my 37th week.
I have only heard that doctors are like Gods until I met Ritu mam. She is the perfect example for the same. 
Here are few checkpoints about mam every new would be mother would like to go through:
1. Explains the process and the scans very well as you will get full idea why the tests and scans are happening to you.
2. Always available at anytime of the day and very much approachable as she is just a message away.
3. She is in the good term with other specialists also who would be needed for the particular scan and as a result those Drs also treat you like there own patients 
4. She supports thoroughly at the time of any mishaps. And get through you with the problem.
5. She delivers what she promises.
6. After delivery also she keep on checking what the status is every week. 
7. Mam is such a soft hearted person as she will make you feel like your own sister so that you can discuss anything with her without any hesitation.
At last I have got my baby‚Äôs guardian angel... Me and my husband along with our families can‚Äôt thank you enough for what all you did for us. 

Shilpi

review:
Before meeting Dr. Rituparna bera mam we have taken treatment from more than 10 well known doctor in Bangalore for my wife pregnancy related issues and for family planning. review:
I was under the care/observation of  Dr.Rituparna throughout my pregnancy. I am very happy to find a doctor like her. She gives time for all our queries  and clarifies all things in the  way we understand. She is very friendly and greets everyone with warm smile always.  She is a person with abundant knowledge on every complication and knows how to treat.
She will not go for procedures directly. She always gives time and encourages on natural conception and normal delivery. She will go for procedures only if needed and after giving enough time. She observed me in labor for 14 hours and then only took the call for C-section as there was not much progress and also my full term of 40 weeks was completed and cant wait further. I will definitely recommend her to every women whatever the concern/situation is. Thank you so much Ritu mam for being there all through the pregnancy and the journey was easy and wonderful with you. Looking forward meeting you  again for my second pregnancy.

review: We consulted Dr. Ritu for our first pregnancy.  Her support and guidance throughout our pregnancy journey was amazing. She doesn't recommend any unnecessary tests. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr Ritu going through google review. As we were planning pregnancy we wanted to consult an Obgyn for proper guidance and that was the best decision we made. In the first check up she made things clear and asked me to do thyroid test, as my levels were little high she prescribed me thyroid medicine and to follow basic healthy lifestyle. Following all these I conceived naturally in 3 months. During my first trimester I had little complications as my placenta was low lying and I had a small hematoma which got cured in a month under Ritu mam's treatment. During my pregnancy journey Ritu mam prescribed very minimum tests and no any unnecessary medications. she always was in connection with me throughout in whatsApp and phone. During my last trimester I has got Colestasis, which is a risk condition that might happen during last trimester. Ritu mam wanted me to track baby's movement and send that everyday to her, starting from week 32 till the day before delivery, also she was tracking my LFT's and Bile acids properly under proper weekly intervals. As my levels were going high during week 36,  baby boy was delivered by Ritu mam undergoing Csec at 30 April'23 . We are very happy with her guidance/treatment and will personally suggest people to consult her if you are looking for any obgyn problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr Rituparna for PCOD and pregnancy treatment in the month of February End. In the first appointment Dr Rituparna clearly explained the underlying problem we'll with patience and started the treatment. The treatment began with few lifestyle changes and few medications. Lifestyle changes and medication both together help me in loosing weight and I could see the Result. Result was so good and so quick that by May first week I conceived. 
Me and my husband were shocked..we could not believe that we were going to become parents, as we always thought PCOD treatments takes time.. But Dr.Rituparna proved it wrong.. 
From May 5th a new journey started.. Dr.Rituparna guided me to proform all the scans and blood test time to time. Everything went well till 35th week..  In 35th week we went for growth scan.. and the report showed different in growth of the twin babies.. So Dr.Rituparna decided to deliver within 36 weeks to preven compilations. Surgery was done well without any complications.. both the babies were delivered healthy without any complications.. and we got discharged in 3 days.. 
I fall short of words to express how grateful I am to Dr. Rituparna Bera Sarkar for making our dream come true. Thank you so much Dr.RituparnaüôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife Mrs sujithra was pregnant along with big 5 fibroids .she was suffering from pain  and one day   via Google we came to know about Ritu mam clinic.we visit the clinic .she  scanned and explained that fibroids are quite big hence we need to more careful .she monitored my wife every month and medicine are given to reduce the pain .some days during late night my wife gets pain . We called Ritu mam over phone .she picked the call  during late night also and explain us what need to do  to stop the pain. The care and the way she explains the things in that itself my wife will get relief . By 33 week this fibroids pain got increased as baby started more strech in womb .so we decided for c section and gone to visit mam however Ritu mam not agreed for that she said this much days u have bear the pain so pls wait for another 4 more weeks so that we can avoid premature baby and also to avoid NICU .she give my wife mental support and made her more strong for bear the pain .now this week monday my wife has delivered the baby in 37th week. baby and mother is fine  now . really i would thank Ritu mam from depth of heart for all mental support  * **** *** ** *** **** ************ i would suggest to all .thank you mam  no more words to explain you mam . thanks a lot .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dr. Ritu has all the qualities one looks for in a doctor but rarely finds. For the 9 months that I was under her care, I was struck by her personal, individualized attention. She was thorough in her explanations and took her time answering my questions, often anticipating them. I was further impressed with her incredible professional responsiveness in terms of communication. She responded to WhatsApp and phone calls within the same day and always contacted me personally every time i needed. These qualities alone would have set her apart from other physicians. Her expertise made me feel reassured, confident and taken care of. 
Medical institutions aren't always so in tune with individual needs. Patients are usually one of many and are treated as such. Dr. Ritu treats each patient as if they are the only one, and it is remarkable that she makes what could potentially be an impersonal institutional context more personal and thoughtful."She is truly an exceptional doctor, and I can‚Äôt praise her enough.¬† In short, we had a great experience with her.¬†

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I've been known Dr. Ritu past 2 yrs. She's honestly been a very friendly and dedicated doctor so far. How do I start my story?I've been come for stomach pain, but found a good therapist for my personal problems. Honestly I don't think any other doctor would be so cool with a patient. 2 yrs passed and I've been for small gynic issues. But here comes my major health issue, I had a tiny paraovarian cyst which was not really a big problem, but doctor really insisted me a lot to take out the cyst. I didn't agree to it at first, but later on my stomach had bad cramps and so many. Finally my surgery was fixed 1 month back, but again to my fate there was something wrong in one of my ovary which was found during the surgery. It was a borderline tumour as told in my biopsy, so I was suggested to remove my right ovary because it might turn cancerous anytime. I had complete trust on the doctor, so I went ahead with another surgery 2 weeks back. Now I'm all good and healthy. So, all in all this is my story and whoever takes a look on my story, you can happily trust Dr.Ritu who is a well trained and experienced, importantly the most friendly one. And I'm super happy to share my story with u allüôÇüôÇThank you so much Dr. Ritu, and all ur support so far means a lot to meüôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We met Dr Ritu after 3 years of marriage and planning for conceiving, doctor explained some tips to be followed without any medication which we followed and I got conceived in 3 months after consultation, We were very happy to know that we are going to delivery our baby soon. Every month the progress was scanned and baby's growth was observed and my health and diet was continuously kept at watch. Most lovable and suggested part of Dr Ritu is she don't suggest unwanted medicine and explain what are the exercises to be done for a normal delivery of baby without much complications. We highly recommend Dr Ritu for the one who is planning for pregnancy and waited too long to see their baby. We are thankful to meet a friendly Dr like her.

review: Extremely happy and satisfied with Dr. Rituparna and Ritu women's Clinic staff ( sister Vanaja, Sharon, Maya). All the sisters were super supportive during my entire journey. Being a PCOD pts I was trying for pregnancy for more than 3 years. With the friend's recommendation, I met Ritu mam. Like a family member , She explained my condition and treated me like her own sister. I conceived after four months. I trusted her blindly and followed whatever she suggested. review: We've been consulting Dr. Rituparna for the past 3 years for Menstrual health and pregnancy. Most recent being the arrival of our second baby through normal delivery and well managed pregnancy. Doctor is extremely professional in her approach yet empathetic and friendly. There were some challenges in the journey but with Dr.Ritu, it was very positive and encouraging. She explains every step in the process and the need for medication if any very clearly. She is extremely comitted to each patient/ delivery. As the delivery date approaches she takes personal care and guides through WhatsAppPositives about the clinic :1. Having in-house ultrasound scan is a great advantage - it's hassle free and every decision is well informed2. Recent expansion of space and renovation is really helpful3. Most of the medicines are available in-house4. Very high quality consultation in affordable cost - servers all segments of the society!!
